Dutch: Do you have the Helper Text Books I need? Please hurry, the test is very soon. I'm so nervous!

English: The Helper Text Books can be found in the flower bed behind Public Office of Flarine.
Dutch: The Helper Text Books can be found in the flower bed behind Public Office of Flarine.

English: Find the Portrait of Radion
Dutch: Find the Portrait of Radion

English: Hey! You there! I don't know what to do. My drawing... My best drawing has disappeared!
Dutch: Hey! You there! I don't know what to do. My drawing... My best drawing has disappeared!

English: My hobby is collecting rare and expensive artwork. This morning I redecorating my house and I realized my most prized drawing was gone!
Dutch: My hobby is collecting rare and expensive artwork. This morning I redecorating my house and I realized my most prized drawing was gone!

English: It is the portrait of the wise man, Radion. There are a number of suspects and I have no idea where to begin. What should I do?
Dutch: It is the portrait of the wise man, Radion. There are a number of suspects and I have no idea where to begin. What should I do?

English: Wait a minute… I have an idea. Will you do me a favor?
Dutch: Wait a minute… I have an idea. Will you do me a favor?

English: You will?! Thank you! I need you to speak with Helgar in Saint City. He is a connoisseur of rare and precious items. Perhaps he knows something.
Dutch: You will?! Thank you! I need you to speak with Helgar in Saint City. He is a connoisseur of rare and precious items. Perhaps he knows something.

English: No, please! You must help me! I don't know what else to do!
Dutch: No, please! You must help me! I don't know what else to do!

English: What? The portrait disappeared? Hmm... I knew this was going to happen.
Dutch: What? The portrait disappeared? Hmm... I knew this was going to happen.

English: Rudvihil has a taste for rare and expensive things. He's also very greedy, and lacks values.
Dutch: Rudvihil has a taste for rare and expensive things. He's also very greedy, and lacks values.

English: If he truly has lost it, I'll do what I can to help.
Dutch: If he truly has lost it, I'll do what I can to help.

English: Do you have something that needs my appraisal? Let me see.
Dutch: Do you have something that needs my appraisal? Let me see.

English: Visit Helgar, the connoisseur of rare and expensive items in the Saint City Square.
Dutch: Visit Helgar, the connoisseur of rare and expensive items in the Saint City Square.

English: Evidence of the Portrait 1
Dutch: Evidence of the Portrait 1

English: I don't even like speaking of Rudvihil. He is disrespectful and his actions go against everything I stand for. You need to visit the High-Dwarpets in Flaris.
Dutch: I don't even like speaking of Rudvihil. He is disrespectful and his actions go against everything I stand for. You need to visit the High-Dwarpets in Flaris.

English: Oh, you've heard of them, then? Well, they may be able to help us. I've heard they have strange powers that may help us find the missing portrait.
Dutch: Oh, you've heard of them, then? Well, they may be able to help us. I've heard they have strange powers that may help us find the missing portrait.

English: Those High-Dwarpets collect ancient books and other rare treasures. How is it they can collect these things more easily than others?
Dutch: Those High-Dwarpets collect ancient books and other rare treasures. How is it they can collect these things more easily than others?

English: The answer? They are clairvoyant. This allows them to see and hear things that you and I cannot comprehend. I am certain they would be able to help.
Dutch: The answer? They are clairvoyant. This allows them to see and hear things that you and I cannot comprehend. I am certain they would be able to help.

English: Will you meet with them?
Dutch: Will you meet with them?

English: Excellent. You know where they live, right? They live in the middle of the Leren Mountains in Flaris.
Dutch: Excellent. You know where they live, right? They live in the middle of the Leren Mountains in Flaris.

English: If you don't wish to help recover what is arguably one of the most valuable pieces of art in Madrigal, then that is your business. It's a shame.
Dutch: If you don't wish to help recover what is arguably one of the most valuable pieces of art in Madrigal, then that is your business. It's a shame.

English: A missing portrait you say? Of Radion? Yes, I have heard of it. I will do what I can to help. Please allow me to focus my thoughts for a moment. Hmmmm….
Dutch: A missing portrait you say? Of Radion? Yes, I have heard of it. I will do what I can to help. Please allow me to focus my thoughts for a moment. Hmmmm….

English: I think I've found it. Yes, this has to be the one. Here, let me draw you a picture…
Dutch: I think I've found it. Yes, this has to be the one. Here, let me draw you a picture…

English: I drew the face of the thieves who stole the portrait. This is all I can do for you.
Dutch: I drew the face of the thieves who stole the portrait. This is all I can do for you.

English: Now please go away. I can only stand humans for so long…
Dutch: Now please go away. I can only stand humans for so long…

English: The High-Dwarpets live in the middle of the Leren Mountains in Flaris. Please go there and meet with them.
Dutch: The High-Dwarpets live in the middle of the Leren Mountains in Flaris. Please go there and meet with them.

English: Evidence of the Portrait 2
Dutch: Evidence of the Portrait 2

English: We're going to need more information if we are to find the missing portrait. Wait, maybe Ancimys can help.
Dutch: We're going to need more information if we are to find the missing portrait. Wait, maybe Ancimys can help.

English: Powerful black magicians once existed in Madrigal. They used black magic which is slightly different than what our modern day Magicians use.
Dutch: Powerful black magicians once existed in Madrigal. They used black magic which is slightly different than what our modern day Magicians use.

English: One of them made a box possessing great magical power… Ancimys. Some say that very same magician locked himself inside the box, hahaha!
Dutch: One of them made a box possessing great magical power… Ancimys. Some say that very same magician locked himself inside the box, hahaha!

English: He may be able to use Psychmetria... What? You don't know what Psychmetria is?
Dutch: He may be able to use Psychmetria... What? You don't know what Psychmetria is?

English: Psychmetria is a powerful black magic spell that can pinpoint the location of an object. You must go and find Ancimys.
Dutch: Psychmetria is a powerful black magic spell that can pinpoint the location of an object. You must go and find Ancimys.

English: The Ancimys you need to speak with is just south of here.
Dutch: The Ancimys you need to speak with is just south of here.

English: What do I care if you don't do it? It's no skin off my back…
Dutch: What do I care if you don't do it? It's no skin off my back…

English: A missing portrait? Well, isn't that exciting! I was so bored I thought I was going to fall asleep! Tell me more about this portrait.
Dutch: A missing portrait? Well, isn't that exciting! I was so bored I thought I was going to fall asleep! Tell me more about this portrait.

English: Alright, give me a moment… Mmmmmm, yes. I've got it! I see a camp… and large creatures with hammers and blades for hands.
Dutch: Alright, give me a moment… Mmmmmm, yes. I've got it! I see a camp… and large creatures with hammers and blades for hands.

English: Ah ha! It's the Red Bang Troupe camp northeast of the Mars Mine. One of those big beasts has it! It's difficult to get to, but I'm sure you'll manage!
Dutch: Ah ha! It's the Red Bang Troupe camp northeast of the Mars Mine. One of those big beasts has it! It's difficult to get to, but I'm sure you'll manage!

English: Are you going to play with me? Really? Good! What will we do? Hide and Seek? YAY!
Dutch: Are you going to play with me? Really? Good! What will we do? Hide and Seek? YAY!

English: Find Ancimys south of the High-Dwarpet camp and ask him to find the portrait for you.
Dutch: Find Ancimys south of the High-Dwarpet camp and ask him to find the portrait for you.

English: Get the Portrait Back
Dutch: Get the Portrait Back

English: Be careful, I hear those Red Bang Troupe members pack quite a punch. I never liked them anyway. They don't tell good jokes.
Dutch: Be careful, I hear those Red Bang Troupe members pack quite a punch. I never liked them anyway. They don't tell good jokes.

English: I grow tired of those who are all work and no play. Kind of like you. Do you ever just have fun? Or is everything always work, work, work?
Dutch: I grow tired of those who are all work and no play. Kind of like you. Do you ever just have fun? Or is everything always work, work, work?

English: Ugh… well unless you have something funny to say, I think our business is concluded. I need to rest now. Black Magic takes a lot out of me.
Dutch: Ugh… well unless you have something funny to say, I think our business is concluded. I need to rest now. Black Magic takes a lot out of me.

English: What do you mean? I'm not in a bad mood. I'm like this to everyone. Unless you can make me laugh!
Dutch: What do you mean? I'm not in a bad mood. I'm like this to everyone. Unless you can make me laugh!

English: Is that my portrait?! Give it here!
Dutch: Is that my portrait?! Give it here!

English: Wait, what? What reward? I never said anything about a reward. Begone, pest!
Dutch: Wait, what? What reward? I never said anything about a reward. Begone, pest!

English: Let this be a lesson to you. Before helping someone, make sure you find out upfront whether or not there is a reward being offered. Hahaha!
Dutch: Let this be a lesson to you. Before helping someone, make sure you find out upfront whether or not there is a reward being offered. Hahaha!

English: You haven't found it yet? Well keep looking!
Dutch: You haven't found it yet? Well keep looking!

English: Travel to the Red Bang Troup camp northeast of the Mars Mine and recover the Portrait of Radion. Return it to Rudvihil once you find it.
Dutch: Travel to the Red Bang Troup camp northeast of the Mars Mine and recover the Portrait of Radion. Return it to Rudvihil once you find it.

English: Bone of Wagsaac
Dutch: Bone of Wagsaac

English: Psssst! Hey... You there! Over here! Sorry for whispering, but this is a secret from the Lab of Madrigal.
Dutch: Psssst! Hey... You there! Over here! Sorry for whispering, but this is a secret from the Lab of Madrigal.

English: In the Lab of Madrigal, a secret project is underway. This is actually a disguise I'm wearing, hahaha! This secret project has to do with cloning monsters!
Dutch: In the Lab of Madrigal, a secret project is underway. This is actually a disguise I'm wearing, hahaha! This secret project has to do with cloning monsters!

English: Why are we cloning them? Because we can, obviously! What kind of question is that? Muahahaha! Okay, listen. I need something for our cloning study.
Dutch: Why are we cloning them? Because we can, obviously! What kind of question is that? Muahahaha! Okay, listen. I need something for our cloning study.

English: You think you might be able to help me out?
Dutch: You think you might be able to help me out?

English: Perrrrfect! In the interest of furthering our studies on Wagsaac DNA, I need some of their bones. Bring me 10 Wagsaac Bones.
Dutch: Perrrrfect! In the interest of furthering our studies on Wagsaac DNA, I need some of their bones. Bring me 10 Wagsaac Bones.

English: You don't want to do it, eh? Fine, I'll find someone else.
Dutch: You don't want to do it, eh? Fine, I'll find someone else.

English: Hmmm *Sniff* *Sniff*... Yep! This is prime grade-A Wagsaac Bone right here. Good job, sport!
Dutch: Hmmm *Sniff* *Sniff*... Yep! This is prime grade-A Wagsaac Bone right here. Good job, sport!

English: We've got all the time in the world. Take your time. We're busy developing a mix between a Mushpang and an Aibatt. We're calling them Mushbatts!
Dutch: We've got all the time in the world. Take your time. We're busy developing a mix between a Mushpang and an Aibatt. We're calling them Mushbatts!

English: Gather 10 Wagsaac Bones from Wagsaacs south of the Saint Tree in Saint City.
Dutch: Gather 10 Wagsaac Bones from Wagsaacs south of the Saint Tree in Saint City.

English: Gene of Wagsaac
Dutch: Gene of Wagsaac

English: What, you thought that was it? Oh no, I have plenty more for you to do, champ!
Dutch: What, you thought that was it? Oh no, I have plenty more for you to do, champ!

English: We require more data to complete our research. Feel like helping out again?
Dutch: We require more data to complete our research. Feel like helping out again?

English: Great! We need 10 Gene Pieces from Wagsaacs this time. We're close to cloning out first Wagsaac! Get going!
Dutch: Great! We need 10 Gene Pieces from Wagsaacs this time. We're close to cloning out first Wagsaac! Get going!

English: Don't want to do it, eh? You kill hundreds of small animals and you're going to preach to me about ethics?
Dutch: Don't want to do it, eh? You kill hundreds of small animals and you're going to preach to me about ethics?

English: Ohhh yeah! This is good stuff! Thanks again!
Dutch: Ohhh yeah! This is good stuff! Thanks again!

English: Take your time, friend. We're busy making Jack in the Giggle Boxes out of Jack the Hammers and Giggle Boxes!
Dutch: Take your time, friend. We're busy making Jack in the Giggle Boxes out of Jack the Hammers and Giggle Boxes!

English: Gather 10 pieces of Wagsaac DNA for Heitung in Saint City.
Dutch: Gather 10 pieces of Wagsaac DNA for Heitung in Saint City.

English: Origin of Bone Bowl
Dutch: Origin of Bone Bowl

English: *Gnarllll!* Hey! You there! You don't know me, right? My reputation usually precedes me. I am the strange collector!
Dutch: *Gnarllll!* Hey! You there! You don't know me, right? My reputation usually precedes me. I am the strange collector!

English: I wanted to ask you something. Have you ever heard of the Bone Bowl? No, not just some random Bone Bowl. THE Bone Bowl!
Dutch: I wanted to ask you something. Have you ever heard of the Bone Bowl? No, not just some random Bone Bowl. THE Bone Bowl!

English: I'm talking about the original cursed Bone Bowl.
Dutch: I'm talking about the original cursed Bone Bowl.

English: I am looking to acquire it. Will you help me?
Dutch: I am looking to acquire it. Will you help me?

English: *Grawrrrll* Great! Head to the Garden of Rhisis and find (Bowl Merchant) Bowler! *SNARF!*
Dutch: *Grawrrrll* Great! Head to the Garden of Rhisis and find (Bowl Merchant) Bowler! *SNARF!*

English: Oh come on! I can pay you as much as you want! *GNARL*
Dutch: Oh come on! I can pay you as much as you want! *GNARL*

English: Hmmm… so the strange collector wants the Bone Bowl, huh?
Dutch: Hmmm… so the strange collector wants the Bone Bowl, huh?

English: Hahaha! I knew this day would come.
Dutch: Hahaha! I knew this day would come.

English: Hello there! Are you looking for something special?
Dutch: Hello there! Are you looking for something special?

English: Locate Bowler, the Bowl Merchant in the Garden of Rhisis.
Dutch: Locate Bowler, the Bowl Merchant in the Garden of Rhisis.

English: The 1st Bone Bowl
Dutch: The 1st Bone Bowl

English: The Bone Bowl was created by a black magician a long long time ago. In a town, a woman lived with her little pet, who was named Baby.
Dutch: The Bone Bowl was created by a black magician a long long time ago. In a town, a woman lived with her little pet, who was named Baby.

English: The pet went crazy and began attacking townsfolk. As a result, both of them were kicked out of the town.
Dutch: The pet went crazy and began attacking townsfolk. As a result, both of them were kicked out of the town.

English: The woman came back to the town, but the people in town killed her pet! Then the black magician made a bowl out of the skull of her pet and cursed it!
Dutch: The woman came back to the town, but the people in town killed her pet! Then the black magician made a bowl out of the skull of her pet and cursed it!

English: The town disappeared because of the curse, and so did the bowl…but there are some that say…Well, I've already said too much.
Dutch: The town disappeared because of the curse, and so did the bowl…but there are some that say…Well, I've already said too much.

English: So you want the real Bone Bowl, right? Well, you'll have to do something for me first. Nothing in this world is free, right? Hahaha!
Dutch: So you want the real Bone Bowl, right? Well, you'll have to do something for me first. Nothing in this world is free, right? Hahaha!

English: Good! Bring me 10 Black Tombmarbles from Tombstone Bearers, 5 Black Spell Books and 5 Black Heroka Grass from somewhere in the Garden of Rhisis.
Dutch: Good! Bring me 10 Black Tombmarbles from Tombstone Bearers, 5 Black Spell Books and 5 Black Heroka Grass from somewhere in the Garden of Rhisis.

English: Hey, it's up to you. Too bad though, I could have used those items to help you with your problem…
Dutch: Hey, it's up to you. Too bad though, I could have used those items to help you with your problem…

English: Great job! This stuff will come in real handy!
Dutch: Great job! This stuff will come in real handy!

English: You did not bring me everything I asked. Please bring me the items I requested.
Dutch: You did not bring me everything I asked. Please bring me the items I requested.

English: Bring 10 Black Tombmarbles from Tombstone Bearers, 5 Black Spell Books and 5 black Heroka grass to Bowler the Bowl Merchant in Rhisis.
Dutch: Bring 10 Black Tombmarbles from Tombstone Bearers, 5 Black Spell Books and 5 black Heroka grass to Bowler the Bowl Merchant in Rhisis.

English: Facts of Bone Bowl
Dutch: Facts of Bone Bowl

English: To be honest, it disappeared a long time ago. It corroded because it was made of bone.
Dutch: To be honest, it disappeared a long time ago. It corroded because it was made of bone.

English: That is why I asked you to bring me these materials. These are the materials that the black magician used to place the curse on the Bone Bowl in the first place.
Dutch: That is why I asked you to bring me these materials. These are the materials that the black magician used to place the curse on the Bone Bowl in the first place.

English: I do not have the power to curse it as strongly as the black magician did. I can certainly curse it as much as any collector could!
Dutch: I do not have the power to curse it as strongly as the black magician did. I can certainly curse it as much as any collector could!

English: Now, please bring this Bone Bowl to the Strange Collector.
Dutch: Now, please bring this Bone Bowl to the Strange Collector.

English: The Strange Collector will be very happy. Just don't tell him I had to make another one. Hahaha!
Dutch: The Strange Collector will be very happy. Just don't tell him I had to make another one. Hahaha!

English: There's nothing to be afraid of! The curse isn't contagious! Muahaha!
Dutch: There's nothing to be afraid of! The curse isn't contagious! Muahaha!

English: You got it?! Amazing! Look at the craftsmanship! And it's do well preserved! It's as if it was made today!
Dutch: You got it?! Amazing! Look at the craftsmanship! And it's do well preserved! It's as if it was made today!

English: Great job, my friend. This bowl is amazing!
Dutch: Great job, my friend. This bowl is amazing!

English: You don't have it yet? Well, what are you waiting for? Go!
Dutch: You don't have it yet? Well, what are you waiting for? Go!

English: Take the Bone Bowl to the Strange Collector in Northern Saint City.
Dutch: Take the Bone Bowl to the Strange Collector in Northern Saint City.

English: Tears of Mother
Dutch: Tears of Mother

English: Please help me! My daughter has been missing for so long!
Dutch: Please help me! My daughter has been missing for so long!

English: My daughter disappeared a few years ago. I have reported her missing to the Public Office and tried to find her myself, but to no avail.
Dutch: My daughter disappeared a few years ago. I have reported her missing to the Public Office and tried to find her myself, but to no avail.

English: I have done everything I can do so far, but I'm at my wits end. I'm even asking Vagrants for help now!
Dutch: I have done everything I can do so far, but I'm at my wits end. I'm even asking Vagrants for help now!

English: Please, will you help me find my daughter?
Dutch: Please, will you help me find my daughter?

English: Thank you. I think you can obtain some information from Porgo, who lives in nearby Saint Hall. He will definitely know something.
Dutch: Thank you. I think you can obtain some information from Porgo, who lives in nearby Saint Hall. He will definitely know something.

English: *Faints*
Dutch: *Faints*

English: Hmm... JeongHwa has not given up on finding her daughter yet. What a pity, but her daughter is not the only child who has disappeared recently.
Dutch: Hmm... JeongHwa has not given up on finding her daughter yet. What a pity, but her daughter is not the only child who has disappeared recently.

English: Lots of the girls from Saint City disappeared. I formed a citizen investigation team, but we failed to discover any clues.
Dutch: Lots of the girls from Saint City disappeared. I formed a citizen investigation team, but we failed to discover any clues.

English: Now I am the only one left from the team, but I am still investigating the case because we'd like to bring those kids home.
Dutch: Now I am the only one left from the team, but I am still investigating the case because we'd like to bring those kids home.

English: I am the leader of the investigation team that was investigating the missing children. But now, I am the only one left...
Dutch: I am the leader of the investigation team that was investigating the missing children. But now, I am the only one left...

English: Go to Saint Hall in Saint City, and meet with Porgo.
Dutch: Go to Saint Hall in Saint City, and meet with Porgo.

English: Kids Disappeared?
Dutch: Kids Disappeared?

English: The case of the missing children? Hmm... Well a few years ago, a group of young, six year old girls suddenly disappeared from Saint City.
Dutch: The case of the missing children? Hmm... Well a few years ago, a group of young, six year old girls suddenly disappeared from Saint City.

English: Everyone attempted to find the kids, but they all failed.
Dutch: Everyone attempted to find the kids, but they all failed.

English: I never gave up and I kept trying to solve the case. I had discovered many things, and reported them to the Public Office.
Dutch: I never gave up and I kept trying to solve the case. I had discovered many things, and reported them to the Public Office.

English: However, they rejected my findings due to the lack of evidence. So as I was gathering evidence, I suddenly came up with an idea when I saw those strange Masquerpets; Mia.
Dutch: However, they rejected my findings due to the lack of evidence. So as I was gathering evidence, I suddenly came up with an idea when I saw those strange Masquerpets; Mia.

English: Anyway, will you help me?
Dutch: Anyway, will you help me?

English: Great! Slay 20 Small Mias and tell me what you make of them.
Dutch: Great! Slay 20 Small Mias and tell me what you make of them.

English: That's a shame. I guess there's no hope for those girls…
Dutch: That's a shame. I guess there's no hope for those girls…

English: Uh huh, yes. I see. Okay, thank you for bringing me this information, friend.
Dutch: Uh huh, yes. I see. Okay, thank you for bringing me this information, friend.

English: I need more information, friend. Please slay 20 Small Mias and report back to me.
Dutch: I need more information, friend. Please slay 20 Small Mias and report back to me.

English: Slay 20 Small Mias and return to Porgo, in Saint City.
Dutch: Slay 20 Small Mias and return to Porgo, in Saint City.

English: Facts of Mia
Dutch: Facts of Mia

English: Argh! Curse that darn mayor! He won't even listen to me!
Dutch: Argh! Curse that darn mayor! He won't even listen to me!

English: What's the matter, you ask? I brought him the evidence you obtained for me. I was told it was too long ago and that nobody cares about the case anymore.
Dutch: What's the matter, you ask? I brought him the evidence you obtained for me. I was told it was too long ago and that nobody cares about the case anymore.

English: How could he be so heartless? These are children we are talking about, here! I need to find a way to get him to look at this evidence.
Dutch: How could he be so heartless? These are children we are talking about, here! I need to find a way to get him to look at this evidence.

English: Would you mind helping me once more?
Dutch: Would you mind helping me once more?

English: If you bring him the evidence instead of me, maybe he will take a look at it. I've bugged him enough about this over the years, but maybe a fresh face will do the trick!
Dutch: If you bring him the evidence instead of me, maybe he will take a look at it. I've bugged him enough about this over the years, but maybe a fresh face will do the trick!

English: But… please, think of the children.
Dutch: But… please, think of the children.

English: Oh for Madrigal's sake! Porgo never gives up! Okay, please bring this to him and tell him never to bring this case up to me again!
Dutch: Oh for Madrigal's sake! Porgo never gives up! Okay, please bring this to him and tell him never to bring this case up to me again!

English: I tour the city everyday in order to listen the opinions of the citizens. Have a wonderful adventure in our fair city!
Dutch: I tour the city everyday in order to listen the opinions of the citizens. Have a wonderful adventure in our fair city!

English: Speak with the Mayor of Saint City and give him the evidence from the Mias.
Dutch: Speak with the Mayor of Saint City and give him the evidence from the Mias.

English: Doll of Mia
Dutch: Doll of Mia

English: What? It worked? What do you have there? Oh my… then this means… That's horrible!
Dutch: What? It worked? What do you have there? Oh my… then this means… That's horrible!

English: Thank you very much for bringing this to me, adventurer. I need to tell JeongHwa right away.
Dutch: Thank you very much for bringing this to me, adventurer. I need to tell JeongHwa right away.

English: Wait a minute, she's not going to believe me unless I have some proof. Where can I get some proof? Yes… That's it!
Dutch: Wait a minute, she's not going to believe me unless I have some proof. Where can I get some proof? Yes… That's it!

English: If her daughter is still amongst Mias, then she would still have her most prized possession. I need it in order to persuade JeongHwa. Would you bring it to me, please?
Dutch: If her daughter is still amongst Mias, then she would still have her most prized possession. I need it in order to persuade JeongHwa. Would you bring it to me, please?

English: JeongHwa had a daughter whose name was Jinyoung. Jinyoung loved her doll very much. Perhaps I can convince JeongHwa if I can find her doll amongst the Mias...
Dutch: JeongHwa had a daughter whose name was Jinyoung. Jinyoung loved her doll very much. Perhaps I can convince JeongHwa if I can find her doll amongst the Mias...

English: You must not know what it is like to lose a child. JeongHwa may never know the truth about her daughter.
Dutch: You must not know what it is like to lose a child. JeongHwa may never know the truth about her daughter.

English: What… do you have there? My daughter's doll? My poor, sweet Jinyoung. Now I can begin to mourn. Thank you, young one. For bringing this to me.
Dutch: What… do you have there? My daughter's doll? My poor, sweet Jinyoung. Now I can begin to mourn. Thank you, young one. For bringing this to me.

English: Have you found my daughter yet? Please don't give up! I'd give anything to see her again.
Dutch: Have you found my daughter yet? Please don't give up! I'd give anything to see her again.

English: Speak with JeongHwa in Saint City.
Dutch: Speak with JeongHwa in Saint City.

English: Uncovered Past
Dutch: Uncovered Past

English: Yes! This is it! The report was definitely written with all the facts, but not all the facts were ever proven.
Dutch: Yes! This is it! The report was definitely written with all the facts, but not all the facts were ever proven.

English: And the color of some of the pages in the report are slightly different. They must have been added later…
Dutch: And the color of some of the pages in the report are slightly different. They must have been added later…

English: It must be because they are trying to keep this whole thing a secret. This is a memo that proves what has been done.
Dutch: It must be because they are trying to keep this whole thing a secret. This is a memo that proves what has been done.

English: The memo instructs them to change the pages in the official report and bury the original behind Saint Hall. We're about to uncover the truth to this mystery!
Dutch: The memo instructs them to change the pages in the official report and bury the original behind Saint Hall. We're about to uncover the truth to this mystery!

English: You think you can give me a hand with this? We're close to finding the truth!
Dutch: You think you can give me a hand with this? We're close to finding the truth!

English: Thank you! If this is true, the original report was buried somewhere near Saint Hall. Please bring it to me. Hurry!
Dutch: Thank you! If this is true, the original report was buried somewhere near Saint Hall. Please bring it to me. Hurry!

English: I know you don't want to get involved, but please. Think of the children.
Dutch: I know you don't want to get involved, but please. Think of the children.

English: You found it! I will do my best to uncover the truth and bring those responsible for hiding this to justice!
Dutch: You found it! I will do my best to uncover the truth and bring those responsible for hiding this to justice!

English: You didn't find it? It has to be there. Check again!
Dutch: You didn't find it? It has to be there. Check again!

English: Find the Disappearance Investigation report buried somewhere near Saint Hall and bring it to Porgo.
Dutch: Find the Disappearance Investigation report buried somewhere near Saint Hall and bring it to Porgo.

English: Revenge of Red Bang Troupe
Dutch: Revenge of Red Bang Troupe

English: That Red Bang Troupe is making me absolutely nuts!
Dutch: That Red Bang Troupe is making me absolutely nuts!

English: They invaded our home and stole our family treasure, leaving only a note yesterday. I was absolutely horrified...
Dutch: They invaded our home and stole our family treasure, leaving only a note yesterday. I was absolutely horrified...

English: I was so scared I couldn't do anything about it. They stole my family treasure, and I am powerless to do anything.
Dutch: I was so scared I couldn't do anything about it. They stole my family treasure, and I am powerless to do anything.

English: If I knew this was going to happen, I would have donated it to the Public Office.
Dutch: If I knew this was going to happen, I would have donated it to the Public Office.

English: What can I do now? Is there anything you can do to help? Please?!
Dutch: What can I do now? Is there anything you can do to help? Please?!

English: Are you serious!? Thank you! The leader of the thieves has my treasure. Their camp is just west of the Fountain of Dead person. Please, find it and bring it back to me!
Dutch: Are you serious!? Thank you! The leader of the thieves has my treasure. Their camp is just west of the Fountain of Dead person. Please, find it and bring it back to me!

English: Oh… okay. Never mind then. I guess my problems are none of your concern.
Dutch: Oh… okay. Never mind then. I guess my problems are none of your concern.

English: My Entanale Sword! Thank you so much! My family treasure has been returned!
Dutch: My Entanale Sword! Thank you so much! My family treasure has been returned!

English: This sword was made by Entanale Boineo, my great great grandfather. It was made out of the bones of an ancient animal...
Dutch: This sword was made by Entanale Boineo, my great great grandfather. It was made out of the bones of an ancient animal...

English: I would like to give this to you in return. Perhaps you can keep it safe from thieves better than I can. Thank you once again, my friend.
Dutch: I would like to give this to you in return. Perhaps you can keep it safe from thieves better than I can. Thank you once again, my friend.

English: You have to find the leader of the troupe. Only he could have done this.
Dutch: You have to find the leader of the troupe. Only he could have done this.

English: Defeat the Red Bang Troupe Leader west of the Fountain of Dead Person and return Luda's family treasure.
Dutch: Defeat the Red Bang Troupe Leader west of the Fountain of Dead Person and return Luda's family treasure.

English: Identity of Red Bang Troupe
Dutch: Identity of Red Bang Troupe

English: I will never forgive them for what they have done. I'm literally fuming with anger right now!
Dutch: I will never forgive them for what they have done. I'm literally fuming with anger right now!

English: Now that their leader has been defeated, I think this is a good opportunity to hit them where it hurts and end this once and for all!
Dutch: Now that their leader has been defeated, I think this is a good opportunity to hit them where it hurts and end this once and for all!

English: I have a plan, but I will need your help again, my friend. Are you up to it?
Dutch: I have a plan, but I will need your help again, my friend. Are you up to it?

English: I knew you would do it! Travel back to their camp, and defeat 5 Red Bang Troupe Members, 1 Red bang Troupe Leader, and bring me 7 of their symbols.
Dutch: I knew you would do it! Travel back to their camp, and defeat 5 Red Bang Troupe Members, 1 Red bang Troupe Leader, and bring me 7 of their symbols.

English: Will you not help me finally rid our town of this nuisance? Speak with me again if you have a change of heart.
Dutch: Will you not help me finally rid our town of this nuisance? Speak with me again if you have a change of heart.

English: Very good! Excellent work! They're probably tucking their tails between their legs now! Muahaha!
Dutch: Very good! Excellent work! They're probably tucking their tails between their legs now! Muahaha!

English: Have you defeated them all yet? Do you have any symbols? No? Then you better get going!
Dutch: Have you defeated them all yet? Do you have any symbols? No? Then you better get going!

English: Defeat 5 Red Bang Troupe Members, 1 Red Bang Troupe Leader, and retrieve 7 Symbols of the Red bang Troupe.
Dutch: Defeat 5 Red Bang Troupe Members, 1 Red Bang Troupe Leader, and retrieve 7 Symbols of the Red bang Troupe.

English: Troupe Leader, Lord Bang
Dutch: Troupe Leader, Lord Bang

English: This… this symbol… it is very intriguing. If I'm right, the real leader of the Red bang Troupe is not the one you defeated.
Dutch: This… this symbol… it is very intriguing. If I'm right, the real leader of the Red bang Troupe is not the one you defeated.

English: This symbol has been found in Darkon 2 as well. Could the real leader of the Red Bang Troupe be hiding there?
Dutch: This symbol has been found in Darkon 2 as well. Could the real leader of the Red Bang Troupe be hiding there?

English: We must find out. The leader must be defeated or this will never end.
Dutch: We must find out. The leader must be defeated or this will never end.

English: I've just received information from one of my colleagues in Darkon 2. I believe we've identified him. Will you help me once again, my friend?
Dutch: I've just received information from one of my colleagues in Darkon 2. I believe we've identified him. Will you help me once again, my friend?

English: Thank you! The information I gathered is that his name is Lord Bang. He was last seen near the Gouthan Mountains in Darkon 2.
Dutch: Thank you! The information I gathered is that his name is Lord Bang. He was last seen near the Gouthan Mountains in Darkon 2.

English: We are so close to putting an end to this nuisance for good! Please, help us!
Dutch: We are so close to putting an end to this nuisance for good! Please, help us!

English: You defeated Lord Bang? Thank goodness! Now we can live without fear of his retaliation. Thank you so much, my friend.
Dutch: You defeated Lord Bang? Thank goodness! Now we can live without fear of his retaliation. Thank you so much, my friend.

English: You must hurry! He has to be defeated before he retaliates! Go to Darkon 2 and find him now!
Dutch: You must hurry! He has to be defeated before he retaliates! Go to Darkon 2 and find him now!

English: Travel to Darkon 2 and defeat Lord Bang. He was last seen somewhere near the Gouthan Mountains.
Dutch: Travel to Darkon 2 and defeat Lord Bang. He was last seen somewhere near the Gouthan Mountains.

English: Special Kids
Dutch: Special Kids

English: Hey! I have some new findings in the case of the missing girls!
Dutch: Hey! I have some new findings in the case of the missing girls!

English: According to this report, there is one more thing in common with the kids who disappeared from Saint City. They were all girls.
Dutch: According to this report, there is one more thing in common with the kids who disappeared from Saint City. They were all girls.

English: But I cannot find out what the similarity is in this report. It's really frustrating!
Dutch: But I cannot find out what the similarity is in this report. It's really frustrating!

English: Will you help me find out what's going on here?
Dutch: Will you help me find out what's going on here?

English: I need you to fight with Captain Mias and Mias and look for similarities between them, or anything you might find strange about them.
Dutch: I need you to fight with Captain Mias and Mias and look for similarities between them, or anything you might find strange about them.

English: You won't? Please, help me. Speak with me again if you change your mind.
Dutch: You won't? Please, help me. Speak with me again if you change your mind.

English: Oh, thank you so much! You've been such a great help so far! I couldn't have made it this far without you!
Dutch: Oh, thank you so much! You've been such a great help so far! I couldn't have made it this far without you!

English: Have you seen any strange similarities between them? Keep looking! I'm counting on you!
Dutch: Have you seen any strange similarities between them? Keep looking! I'm counting on you!

English: Slay Mias and Captain Mias and return to Porgo with any information you gather.
Dutch: Slay Mias and Captain Mias and return to Porgo with any information you gather.

English: Secret Trade
Dutch: Secret Trade

English: I found out the common thing between them based on the data you brought me. I think it has something to do with supernatural power!
Dutch: I found out the common thing between them based on the data you brought me. I think it has something to do with supernatural power!

English: These kids were all afraid of the former mayor and their parents for some reason…
Dutch: These kids were all afraid of the former mayor and their parents for some reason…

English: They were abandoned and kicked out of the city! Wow, that can't be true, can it?!
Dutch: They were abandoned and kicked out of the city! Wow, that can't be true, can it?!

English: We have to uncover the truth in this case and make sure it never happens again. Will you help me?!
Dutch: We have to uncover the truth in this case and make sure it never happens again. Will you help me?!

English: Awesome! Speak with the mayor again, and ask him to review this Disappearance Investigation.
Dutch: Awesome! Speak with the mayor again, and ask him to review this Disappearance Investigation.

English: How can you refuse to help when we are so close to discovering the truth!?
Dutch: How can you refuse to help when we are so close to discovering the truth!?

English: Hmm... This is very intriguing new information. Very well, I'll make a special inquiry group and check the case again. Please tell Porgo I said thanks.
Dutch: Hmm... This is very intriguing new information. Very well, I'll make a special inquiry group and check the case again. Please tell Porgo I said thanks.

English: Saint City is being developed even today. By the way, why did Porgo tell you to meet me? Do you have something to show me?
Dutch: Saint City is being developed even today. By the way, why did Porgo tell you to meet me? Do you have something to show me?

English: Bring the Disappearance Investigation report to the Mayor or Saint City.
Dutch: Bring the Disappearance Investigation report to the Mayor or Saint City.

English: Mia, the Cursed Name
Dutch: Mia, the Cursed Name

English: We made an inquiry group and started to review the case again. I can't believe something this horrific has happened in Saint City.
Dutch: We made an inquiry group and started to review the case again. I can't believe something this horrific has happened in Saint City.

English: I suppose it's better late than never. Will you return to Porgo and let him know that we are investigating the case again? His cooperation is appreciated.
Dutch: I suppose it's better late than never. Will you return to Porgo and let him know that we are investigating the case again? His cooperation is appreciated.

English: Thank you. I will do everything I can to make Saint City more beautiful and peaceful than it already is.
Dutch: Thank you. I will do everything I can to make Saint City more beautiful and peaceful than it already is.

English: I tour the city every day, so I am extremely busy. Please tell him what I said.
Dutch: I tour the city every day, so I am extremely busy. Please tell him what I said.

English: Has the truth finally been revealed? It has?! I am so glad to hear that the case has been reopened.
Dutch: Has the truth finally been revealed? It has?! I am so glad to hear that the case has been reopened.

English: Thank you so much for your help, young one. I couldn't have done all this alone. The girls thank you, as well.
Dutch: Thank you so much for your help, young one. I couldn't have done all this alone. The girls thank you, as well.

English: Have you spoken to the Mayor? Please hurry, this case needs to be reopened!
Dutch: Have you spoken to the Mayor? Please hurry, this case needs to be reopened!

English: Speak with Porgo and tell him the good news.
Dutch: Speak with Porgo and tell him the good news.

English: Legendary Redmantis (Part 1)
Dutch: Legendary Redmantis (Part 1)

English: Hey you! Yeah, you! Come here for a minute… I would like to speak with about something.
Dutch: Hey you! Yeah, you! Come here for a minute… I would like to speak with about something.

English: My name is Rudvihil, and I am a collector or rare and expensive artifacts. I'm always on the lookout for something new and precious.
Dutch: My name is Rudvihil, and I am a collector or rare and expensive artifacts. I'm always on the lookout for something new and precious.

English: Anyway, to the point, I heard some rumors that there is a very rare artifact in Saint Morning.
Dutch: Anyway, to the point, I heard some rumors that there is a very rare artifact in Saint Morning.

English: I intend to acquire this artifact for my collection. I have a vast collection of artifacts and it would make a nice addition.
Dutch: I intend to acquire this artifact for my collection. I have a vast collection of artifacts and it would make a nice addition.

English: So, what do you say? Will you help me find this artifact?
Dutch: So, what do you say? Will you help me find this artifact?

English: Great! Travel to Saint City, and speak with Helgar, the connoisseur of rare and precious items. He should be located near Saint Hall.
Dutch: Great! Travel to Saint City, and speak with Helgar, the connoisseur of rare and precious items. He should be located near Saint Hall.

English: What? You won't help me? Fine, get off my property, then!
Dutch: What? You won't help me? Fine, get off my property, then!

English: Hello there, are you interested in any rare artifacts? I have an stunning ancient Aibatt carving here that is very unique…
Dutch: Hello there, are you interested in any rare artifacts? I have an stunning ancient Aibatt carving here that is very unique…

English: Rudvihil? Hahaha! That guy will never stop hoarding rare and precious treasure.
Dutch: Rudvihil? Hahaha! That guy will never stop hoarding rare and precious treasure.

English: Have you found anything, yet? No? Well hurry up! I don't have all day!
Dutch: Have you found anything, yet? No? Well hurry up! I don't have all day!

English: Travel to Saint City and speak with Helgar, the connoisseur of rare and precious items. He should be located near Saint hall.
Dutch: Travel to Saint City and speak with Helgar, the connoisseur of rare and precious items. He should be located near Saint hall.

English: Legendary Redmantis (Part 2)
Dutch: Legendary Redmantis (Part 2)

English: Hmmm, I think Rudvihil is referring to the Red Mantis Egg. These eggs are difficult to acquire and I think these might be the eggs Rudvihil is after.
Dutch: Hmmm, I think Rudvihil is referring to the Red Mantis Egg. These eggs are difficult to acquire and I think these might be the eggs Rudvihil is after.

English: There are reports that some Red Mantis C, the female variety, have been seen near the pumpkin patch. Feel like taking a trip?
Dutch: There are reports that some Red Mantis C, the female variety, have been seen near the pumpkin patch. Feel like taking a trip?

English: Great! Head to the pumpkin patch, slay 10 Red Mantis C and collect 15 Redyspawn. These are the eggs. Hopefully we'll find a pristine one!
Dutch: Great! Head to the pumpkin patch, slay 10 Red Mantis C and collect 15 Redyspawn. These are the eggs. Hopefully we'll find a pristine one!

English: Are you afraid of a little action? This is a very rare find, it will be worthwhile, I promise. Let me know if you change your mind.
Dutch: Are you afraid of a little action? This is a very rare find, it will be worthwhile, I promise. Let me know if you change your mind.

English: Let me see what you've got there… Hmm yes, these are very nice! Thank you for bring these to me!
Dutch: Let me see what you've got there… Hmm yes, these are very nice! Thank you for bring these to me!

English: What are you doing here? You have work to do!
Dutch: What are you doing here? You have work to do!

English: Travel to the Pumpkin patch, slay 10 Red Mantis C and acquire 15 Redyspawn. Return to Helgar when you've completed this task.
Dutch: Travel to the Pumpkin patch, slay 10 Red Mantis C and acquire 15 Redyspawn. Return to Helgar when you've completed this task.

English: Legendary Redmantis (Part 3)
Dutch: Legendary Redmantis (Part 3)

English: Well, I have good news and bad news. The bad news is, the Redyspawn is not that valuable. The good news, is that I believe I know what Rudvihil is searching for.
Dutch: Well, I have good news and bad news. The bad news is, the Redyspawn is not that valuable. The good news, is that I believe I know what Rudvihil is searching for.

English: It's Emeraldispawn. It is extremely difficult to acquire, as you can only get it once a year.
Dutch: It's Emeraldispawn. It is extremely difficult to acquire, as you can only get it once a year.

English: In addition, it's mother is rather… protective of her eggs. However, we're in luck! It's breeding season!
Dutch: In addition, it's mother is rather… protective of her eggs. However, we're in luck! It's breeding season!

English: Now is our chance! Will you retrieve this egg for Rudvihil?
Dutch: Now is our chance! Will you retrieve this egg for Rudvihil?

English: I knew you would! The mother, Emerald Mantis, is located somewhere near the Central Hillid Mountains. Find and defeat her, then retrieve the egg!
Dutch: I knew you would! The mother, Emerald Mantis, is located somewhere near the Central Hillid Mountains. Find and defeat her, then retrieve the egg!

English: What? Why? We're so close to uncovering a precious artifact? Rudvihil will be disappointed.
Dutch: What? Why? We're so close to uncovering a precious artifact? Rudvihil will be disappointed.

English: Do you have it? Let me see it! Oh my… it is everything I dreamed it would be. Thank you very much, stranger! My collection is getting better and better!
Dutch: Do you have it? Let me see it! Oh my… it is everything I dreamed it would be. Thank you very much, stranger! My collection is getting better and better!

English: Here's a little something for you. Call it a tip! Thanks again!
Dutch: Here's a little something for you. Call it a tip! Thanks again!

English: Do you have it? No? Then get back to work!
Dutch: Do you have it? No? Then get back to work!

English: The Emerald Mantis is located somewhere near the Central Hillid Mountains. Defeat her, retrieve the Emerald Mantis Egg, then return to Rudvihil.
Dutch: The Emerald Mantis is located somewhere near the Central Hillid Mountains. Defeat her, retrieve the Emerald Mantis Egg, then return to Rudvihil.

English: Internal War of Red Bang Troupe
Dutch: Internal War of Red Bang Troupe

English: Listen, I've been talking to some townsfolk…
Dutch: Listen, I've been talking to some townsfolk…

English: After Lord Bang died, I have heard various rumors about the Red Bang Troupe that lead me to believe they are still around.
Dutch: After Lord Bang died, I have heard various rumors about the Red Bang Troupe that lead me to believe they are still around.

English: I can't ignore these rumors. If there is any chance that the Red bang Troup is still in existence, we need to take care of it immediately.
Dutch: I can't ignore these rumors. If there is any chance that the Red bang Troup is still in existence, we need to take care of it immediately.

English: Will you help an old friend once again?
Dutch: Will you help an old friend once again?

English: Thank you, friend. There are reports of Red Bang Troupe activity near the Erons Factory in Darkon 1. I need you to investigate!
Dutch: Thank you, friend. There are reports of Red Bang Troupe activity near the Erons Factory in Darkon 1. I need you to investigate!

English: I can't ignore these rumors. Please help me!
Dutch: I can't ignore these rumors. Please help me!

English: Then it's true. It's worse than I thought. Thank you for bringing me this information.
Dutch: Then it's true. It's worse than I thought. Thank you for bringing me this information.

English: You didn't find anything? These rumors are unsubstantiated, but I believe them to be true.
Dutch: You didn't find anything? These rumors are unsubstantiated, but I believe them to be true.

English: Travel to the Erons Factory in Darkon 1 and search for evidence of Red Bang Troupe activity.
Dutch: Travel to the Erons Factory in Darkon 1 and search for evidence of Red Bang Troupe activity.

English: New Lord Bang
Dutch: New Lord Bang

English: They still exist, huh? I knew it. This can only mean there is a new leader.
Dutch: They still exist, huh? I knew it. This can only mean there is a new leader.

English: Darn it! We've got to do something before it's too late!
Dutch: Darn it! We've got to do something before it's too late!

English: Since there is evidence of a new leader, there must be a new group of Red Bang Troupe members hiding out somewhere.
Dutch: Since there is evidence of a new leader, there must be a new group of Red Bang Troupe members hiding out somewhere.

English: A good friend of mine mentioned having seen some Red bang Troupe members in the Northern Leren Mountains
Dutch: A good friend of mine mentioned having seen some Red bang Troupe members in the Northern Leren Mountains

English: I am sure that the group of them live in the Northern Leren Mountains. Go now, friend, and see if you can identify a new group of troupe members.
Dutch: I am sure that the group of them live in the Northern Leren Mountains. Go now, friend, and see if you can identify a new group of troupe members.

English: I know I've asked for many favors, but we are so close to putting an end to this threat. Please, help me!
Dutch: I know I've asked for many favors, but we are so close to putting an end to this threat. Please, help me!

English: I see. There must be a new leader. Thank you for delivering this information.
Dutch: I see. There must be a new leader. Thank you for delivering this information.

English: Please, hurry! We don't have much time!
Dutch: Please, hurry! We don't have much time!

English: Search the Northern Leren Mountains for evidence of another Red bang Troupe camp.
Dutch: Search the Northern Leren Mountains for evidence of another Red bang Troupe camp.

English: Ambition of Lord Bang
Dutch: Ambition of Lord Bang

English: The new leader of the Red Bang Troupe must be at the Erons Factory location you discovered before.
Dutch: The new leader of the Red Bang Troupe must be at the Erons Factory location you discovered before.

English: We need to strike a blow to his troupe and cripple his operations in Darkon 1.
Dutch: We need to strike a blow to his troupe and cripple his operations in Darkon 1.

English: I know what to do! You need to visit Amadolka. But first, defeat 35 Red bang Troupe Leaders southwest of the Erons Factory.
Dutch: I know what to do! You need to visit Amadolka. But first, defeat 35 Red bang Troupe Leaders southwest of the Erons Factory.

English: Will you help me once more, friend?
Dutch: Will you help me once more, friend?

English: Great! Now please go and visit Amadolka, who is a guard leader at Erons Factory.
Dutch: Great! Now please go and visit Amadolka, who is a guard leader at Erons Factory.

English: You have to believe me! A lot of people are in danger! Do you understand?
Dutch: You have to believe me! A lot of people are in danger! Do you understand?

English: What? Really? Good job thinning the herd a bit.
Dutch: What? Really? Good job thinning the herd a bit.

English: Hmmm... you may prove useful.
Dutch: Hmmm... you may prove useful.

English: I am in charge of security in Erons Factory. Do you know Luda? How is he doing?
Dutch: I am in charge of security in Erons Factory. Do you know Luda? How is he doing?

English: Defeat 35 Red Bang Troupe Leaders and speak with Amadolka at the Erons Factory in Darkon 1.
Dutch: Defeat 35 Red Bang Troupe Leaders and speak with Amadolka at the Erons Factory in Darkon 1.

English: Unified Red Bang Troupe
Dutch: Unified Red Bang Troupe

English: They have occupied almost half of Erons Factory. I didn't realize how strong they really were.
Dutch: They have occupied almost half of Erons Factory. I didn't realize how strong they really were.

English: We are having a hard time defending this narrow entrance, they will get through here in no time unless we do something about it.
Dutch: We are having a hard time defending this narrow entrance, they will get through here in no time unless we do something about it.

English: We need more information! We need a scout to survey their base and let us know what we're really up against.
Dutch: We need more information! We need a scout to survey their base and let us know what we're really up against.

English: You seem like a good candidate for the job. What do you say? Want to help the people of Erons Factory?
Dutch: You seem like a good candidate for the job. What do you say? Want to help the people of Erons Factory?

English: Great! I am sure their base is somewhere in the depths of Darkon 1. Let me know what you find out!
Dutch: Great! I am sure their base is somewhere in the depths of Darkon 1. Let me know what you find out!

English: No? Fine… We will have to deal with it ourselves.
Dutch: No? Fine… We will have to deal with it ourselves.

English: Excellent work! So now we know where exactly their base is located and what we're up against with their new leader.
Dutch: Excellent work! So now we know where exactly their base is located and what we're up against with their new leader.

English: Have you found it yet? We don't have much time! Please, hurry!
Dutch: Have you found it yet? We don't have much time! Please, hurry!

English: Locate the Red bang Troupe base in Erons Factory 2, Darkon 1, and report back to Amadolka with anything you find.
Dutch: Locate the Red bang Troupe base in Erons Factory 2, Darkon 1, and report back to Amadolka with anything you find.

English: Legend of Dreadpet <Big Thyred>
Dutch: Legend of Dreadpet <Big Thyred>

English: Pssst, hey you! I'm writing a book and I need your help. I'm having a bit of writer's block and I need a brave adventurer to help me write it!
Dutch: Pssst, hey you! I'm writing a book and I need your help. I'm having a bit of writer's block and I need a brave adventurer to help me write it!

English: Have you ever heard about the Legend of Big Thyred? No? A long long time ago, there was very a famous adventurer named Big Thyred. One day, he found an interesting place to adventure…
Dutch: Have you ever heard about the Legend of Big Thyred? No? A long long time ago, there was very a famous adventurer named Big Thyred. One day, he found an interesting place to adventure…

English: It was a cave deep underground, surrounded with this strange, bloody fog. Big Thyred investigated the cave only to become infected by a disease within the cave called Horrible Fear.
Dutch: It was a cave deep underground, surrounded with this strange, bloody fog. Big Thyred investigated the cave only to become infected by a disease within the cave called Horrible Fear.

English: The disease transformed him into a hideous monster, whom we now call Big Muscle. There's virtually nothing left of that brave adventurer but bits and pieces, or so the story goes…
Dutch: The disease transformed him into a hideous monster, whom we now call Big Muscle. There's virtually nothing left of that brave adventurer but bits and pieces, or so the story goes…

English: So, here's where you come in. I need to an ending to the story and I'd like to know what's become of Big Muscle. Feel like lending a hand?
Dutch: So, here's where you come in. I need to an ending to the story and I'd like to know what's become of Big Muscle. Feel like lending a hand?

English: One of those mangy Organigors ate one of my reference books. Defeat the Organigors at the Plain of Bubble and acquire the Book of Fear 1. While you're there, find the Fortress Map.
Dutch: One of those mangy Organigors ate one of my reference books. Defeat the Organigors at the Plain of Bubble and acquire the Book of Fear 1. While you're there, find the Fortress Map.

English: Awwww, come on! Look, I'll give you HALF of the sales from my book if you'll help. Still having second thoughts?
Dutch: Awwww, come on! Look, I'll give you HALF of the sales from my book if you'll help. Still having second thoughts?

English: Oh, Rhisis! You've got the Book of Fear! Great work! Alright, sounds like you have what it takes to face Big Muscle.
Dutch: Oh, Rhisis! You've got the Book of Fear! Great work! Alright, sounds like you have what it takes to face Big Muscle.

English:
Here, take this. It's Big Thyred's Heart. 

#b*You drop the heart and scream!*#nb

Hey, careful! You need that!
Dutch:
Here, take this. It's Big Thyred's Heart. 

#b*You drop the heart and scream!*#nb

Hey, careful! You need that!

English: Take the heart to the Dreadpet Manager just southwest of here. You'll have to join a party before you face Big Muscle, it's too dangerous to go alone.
Dutch: Take the heart to the Dreadpet Manager just southwest of here. You'll have to join a party before you face Big Muscle, it's too dangerous to go alone.

English: Look, I know it's scary to face the Organigor, but I believe you can do it. Go, now!
Dutch: Look, I know it's scary to face the Organigor, but I believe you can do it. Go, now!

English: Travel to the Plain of bubble, defeat Organigor, and recover both the Fortress Map and the 1st book of Dread for Novelist Gergantes in Northern Flarine.
Dutch: Travel to the Plain of bubble, defeat Organigor, and recover both the Fortress Map and the 1st book of Dread for Novelist Gergantes in Northern Flarine.

English: Legend of Dreadpet <Krren Dacid>
Dutch: Legend of Dreadpet <Krren Dacid>

English: Pssst, hey you! I'm writing a book and I need your help! I'm having a bit of writer's block and I need a brave adventurer to help me write it!
Dutch: Pssst, hey you! I'm writing a book and I need your help! I'm having a bit of writer's block and I need a brave adventurer to help me write it!

English: Have you ever heard about the legend of Krren Dacid? A long long time ago, there was a very famous adventurer. His name was Krren Dacid. One day, he found an interesting place to adventure…
Dutch: Have you ever heard about the legend of Krren Dacid? A long long time ago, there was a very famous adventurer. His name was Krren Dacid. One day, he found an interesting place to adventure…

English: It was a huge temple in the sky. Krren investigated the temple only to become infected by a disease within the cave called Cold Fear.
Dutch: It was a huge temple in the sky. Krren investigated the temple only to become infected by a disease within the cave called Cold Fear.

English: The disease transformed him into a hideous monster, whom we now call Krrr. There's virtually nothing left of that brave adventurer but bits and pieces, or so they say…
Dutch: The disease transformed him into a hideous monster, whom we now call Krrr. There's virtually nothing left of that brave adventurer but bits and pieces, or so they say…

English: So, here's where you come in. I need an ending to the story and I'd like to know what's become of Krrr. So whaddya' say?
Dutch: So, here's where you come in. I need an ending to the story and I'd like to know what's become of Krrr. So whaddya' say?

English: Great! One of those Gangards at the Plain of Bubble scooped up one of my reference books. Defeat the Gangards and acquire the Book of Fear 2. While you're there, try to find the Temple Map.
Dutch: Great! One of those Gangards at the Plain of Bubble scooped up one of my reference books. Defeat the Gangards and acquire the Book of Fear 2. While you're there, try to find the Temple Map.

English: Oh, come on now! Tell you what, I'll give you 50% of the proceeds from the sale of my book when I release it! How does that sound? Bah!
Dutch: Oh, come on now! Tell you what, I'll give you 50% of the proceeds from the sale of my book when I release it! How does that sound? Bah!

English: Blessings from Bubble, you've got it! It looks like you do indeed have what it takes to face Krrr.
Dutch: Blessings from Bubble, you've got it! It looks like you do indeed have what it takes to face Krrr.

English:
Here, take this. It's Krrr's Heart. 

#b*You vomit all over him*#nb

 Hey, knock it off!
Dutch:
Here, take this. It's Krrr's Heart. 

#b*You vomit all over him*#nb

 Hey, knock it off!

English: If you're done being sick, take the heart to the Dreadpet Manager in Madren Town. You'll have to join a party to enter the temple, it's way too dangerous to go alone.
Dutch: If you're done being sick, take the heart to the Dreadpet Manager in Madren Town. You'll have to join a party to enter the temple, it's way too dangerous to go alone.

English: Look, I know Ganguard's smell bad and all that, so I understand your reservations… but I really need that book.
Dutch: Look, I know Ganguard's smell bad and all that, so I understand your reservations… but I really need that book.

English: Travel to the Plain of Bubble, defeat $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$, and retrieve both the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ and the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME,2$ for Novelist Gergantes in Northern Flarine.
Dutch: Travel to the Plain of Bubble, defeat $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$, and retrieve both the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ and the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME,2$ for Novelist Gergantes in Northern Flarine.

English: Legend of Dreadpet <Moot Arvan>
Dutch: Legend of Dreadpet <Moot Arvan>

English: Pssst, hey you! I am writing a book and I need your help! I've had a little writers block lately and I need a brave adventurer to help me write it!
Dutch: Pssst, hey you! I am writing a book and I need your help! I've had a little writers block lately and I need a brave adventurer to help me write it!

English: Have you ever heard of the legend of Moot Arvan? No? A long time ago, there was very a famous adventurer, Moot Arvan. One day, he found an interesting place to adventure...
Dutch: Have you ever heard of the legend of Moot Arvan? No? A long time ago, there was very a famous adventurer, Moot Arvan. One day, he found an interesting place to adventure...

English: It was a strange, wet marsh. Moot explored the marsh only to become infested with a disease called Unpleasant Fear.
Dutch: It was a strange, wet marsh. Moot explored the marsh only to become infested with a disease called Unpleasant Fear.

English: The disease transformed him into a hideous monster known as Mushmoot! There's virtually nothing left of that brave adventurer but bits and pieces, or so they say…
Dutch: The disease transformed him into a hideous monster known as Mushmoot! There's virtually nothing left of that brave adventurer but bits and pieces, or so they say…

English: So, here's where you come in. I need an ending to the story and I'd like to know what's become of Mushmoot. Feel like helping?
Dutch: So, here's where you come in. I need an ending to the story and I'd like to know what's become of Mushmoot. Feel like helping?

English: Great! One of those pesky Hadeseors at the Plain of Bubble has stolen one of my reference books! Find and recover the book for me and see if you can locate the Boggy Map while you're there.
Dutch: Great! One of those pesky Hadeseors at the Plain of Bubble has stolen one of my reference books! Find and recover the book for me and see if you can locate the Boggy Map while you're there.

English: Don't be a scaredy-cat! Look, I'll even give you 50% of the proceeds from my book sales if you help. Okay?
Dutch: Don't be a scaredy-cat! Look, I'll even give you 50% of the proceeds from my book sales if you help. Okay?

English: Yes, great work! I knew you could do it!
Dutch: Yes, great work! I knew you could do it!

English:
Here, take this. It's Moot's Heart. 

*You begin to feel sick…*

 Oh shake it off, slacker!
Dutch:
Here, take this. It's Moot's Heart. 

*You begin to feel sick…*

 Oh shake it off, slacker!

English: Take that heart to the Dreadpet Manager at the Eastern River of Weeping. You'll need to form a party first, it's way too dangerous to go in there alone.
Dutch: Take that heart to the Dreadpet Manager at the Eastern River of Weeping. You'll need to form a party first, it's way too dangerous to go in there alone.

English: Ah geez! What are you afraid of? A Hadeseor? Psht! I guess you aren't as brave as I thought you were.
Dutch: Ah geez! What are you afraid of? A Hadeseor? Psht! I guess you aren't as brave as I thought you were.

English: Sad Christmas
Dutch: Sad Christmas

English: Hmm... We are in big trouble now. Do you know what happened? Do you? The stockings are gone. The stockings...
Dutch: Hmm... We are in big trouble now. Do you know what happened? Do you? The stockings are gone. The stockings...

English: Are you asking why I am making a big deal about the stockings? Are you serious? These are not normal stockings, these are the Christmas stockings which have the wishes of children!
Dutch: Are you asking why I am making a big deal about the stockings? Are you serious? These are not normal stockings, these are the Christmas stockings which have the wishes of children!

English: A few days ago, every stocking was stolen in Madrigal. I figured out that Masquerpets did it. Now we are in big trouble.
Dutch: A few days ago, every stocking was stolen in Madrigal. I figured out that Masquerpets did it. Now we are in big trouble.

English: Would you please help me make a Merry Christmas in Madrigal?
Dutch: Would you please help me make a Merry Christmas in Madrigal?

English: Thank you. Please hunt every Masquerpet in Madrigal and bring me $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$ stockings. I will definitely reward you.
Dutch: Thank you. Please hunt every Masquerpet in Madrigal and bring me $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$ stockings. I will definitely reward you.

English: No, no... This Christmas will be tragic without the stockings... Oh...
Dutch: No, no... This Christmas will be tragic without the stockings... Oh...

English: Ha ha ha! I knew you would! Thank you so much! But... We still lack enough stockings... Hmm...
Dutch: Ha ha ha! I knew you would! Thank you so much! But... We still lack enough stockings... Hmm...

English: Hey... I told you I need 500 stockings. I know 500 stockings are a lot, but it is not that difficult to get.
Dutch: Hey... I told you I need 500 stockings. I know 500 stockings are a lot, but it is not that difficult to get.

English: Please hunt every Masquerpet in Madrigal and bring me $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$ stockings. I will definitely reward you.
Dutch: Please hunt every Masquerpet in Madrigal and bring me $QUEST_END_ITEM_COUNT$ stockings. I will definitely reward you.

English: Christmas Nightmare
Dutch: Christmas Nightmare

English: Hey, you! Yes, you! Come here. Come! Coooome!
Dutch: Hey, you! Yes, you! Come here. Come! Coooome!

English: You know about the Christmas stockings, right? Well, they disappeared!. Maybe you do not understand, but this is a very big accident. Are you listening?!
Dutch: You know about the Christmas stockings, right? Well, they disappeared!. Maybe you do not understand, but this is a very big accident. Are you listening?!

English: A few days ago, every stocking was stolen in Madrigal. I figured out that the darn Masquerpets did it. Now we are in big trouble. Darn it!
Dutch: A few days ago, every stocking was stolen in Madrigal. I figured out that the darn Masquerpets did it. Now we are in big trouble. Darn it!

English: You can help me create a Merry Christmas in Madrigal, right?
Dutch: You can help me create a Merry Christmas in Madrigal, right?

English: Good! Go and hunt Masquerpets, and bring me 300 stockings. Yes, I will reward you. Go!
Dutch: Good! Go and hunt Masquerpets, and bring me 300 stockings. Yes, I will reward you. Go!

English: Hey! Are you going to make this Christmas into a nightmare? Are you crazy?
Dutch: Hey! Are you going to make this Christmas into a nightmare? Are you crazy?

English: Ha ha ha! Good job! Thank you! But... We still do not have enough stockings...
Dutch: Ha ha ha! Good job! Thank you! But... We still do not have enough stockings...

English: Hey... Are you stupid? Or you cannot count? I told you 300 stockings! 300!
Dutch: Hey... Are you stupid? Or you cannot count? I told you 300 stockings! 300!

English: Go and hunt Masquerpets, and bring me 300 stockings. Yes, I will reward you. Go!
Dutch: Go and hunt Masquerpets, and bring me 300 stockings. Yes, I will reward you. Go!

English: Desperate Christmas
Dutch: Desperate Christmas

English: Hey... We are in big trouble now. The stockings... The stockings... Now what should I do? I have to get the stockings back!
Dutch: Hey... We are in big trouble now. The stockings... The stockings... Now what should I do? I have to get the stockings back!

English: The stockings have the wishes and dreams of all of the children. But... But...
Dutch: The stockings have the wishes and dreams of all of the children. But... But...

English: Every stocking was stolen a few days ago in Madrigal. I figured out that Masquerpets did it. Now we are in big trouble.
Dutch: Every stocking was stolen a few days ago in Madrigal. I figured out that Masquerpets did it. Now we are in big trouble.

English: Would you please help me create a Merry Christmas in Madrigal?
Dutch: Would you please help me create a Merry Christmas in Madrigal?

English: But... This Christmas will be sorrowful without the stockings...
Dutch: But... This Christmas will be sorrowful without the stockings...

English: Ho ho ho! I knew you would! Thank you so much! But... We still do not have enough stockings...
Dutch: Ho ho ho! I knew you would! Thank you so much! But... We still do not have enough stockings...

English: I told you we need 100 stockings...
Dutch: I told you we need 100 stockings...

English: Take Ddukguk Back
Dutch: Take Ddukguk Back

English: Oh my God, I am in big trouble... Psst! Hey, wait! Please listen to me. The biggest holiday in Madrigal, Lunar New Year, is coming soon.
Dutch: Oh my God, I am in big trouble... Psst! Hey, wait! Please listen to me. The biggest holiday in Madrigal, Lunar New Year, is coming soon.

English: So Losha made special Ddukguk for the holiday and asked me to keep it. But the Masquerpets heard of it, and...
Dutch: So Losha made special Ddukguk for the holiday and asked me to keep it. But the Masquerpets heard of it, and...

English: ...and they took all of the Ddukguks away. I could not do anything because I was really terrified... Now what should I do? Losha will kick me out if she knows this.
Dutch: ...and they took all of the Ddukguks away. I could not do anything because I was really terrified... Now what should I do? Losha will kick me out if she knows this.

English: Would you... please help me? For Lunar New Year? Please?
Dutch: Would you... please help me? For Lunar New Year? Please?

English: Thank you! Please hunt every Masquerpet you can find in Madrigal and bring me 100 Ddukguks. I will definitely reward you!
Dutch: Thank you! Please hunt every Masquerpet you can find in Madrigal and bring me 100 Ddukguks. I will definitely reward you!

English: Are you really going to kick me out? Becoming a cook is my dream. Please help me. I cannot give up now.
Dutch: Are you really going to kick me out? Becoming a cook is my dream. Please help me. I cannot give up now.

English: Thank you, thank you so much! Here you are. It is my little present.
Dutch: Thank you, thank you so much! Here you are. It is my little present.

English: Well... I told you I need 100 Ddukguk...
Dutch: Well... I told you I need 100 Ddukguk...

English: Please hunt every Masquerpet you can find in Madrigal and bring me 100 Ddukguks. I will definitely reward you!
Dutch: Please hunt every Masquerpet you can find in Madrigal and bring me 100 Ddukguks. I will definitely reward you!

English: Build Love House -Nina-
Dutch: Build Love House -Nina-

English: Hello! I am Nina, the wife of Poul, who is standing over there. Our family wants to move to here because my husband loves this place very much, but...
Dutch: Hello! I am Nina, the wife of Poul, who is standing over there. Our family wants to move to here because my husband loves this place very much, but...

English: ...but we do not have money to buy a house. So we decided to build a house by ourselves. However...
Dutch: ...but we do not have money to buy a house. So we decided to build a house by ourselves. However...

English: However, people said that we have to hunt Masquerpets if we want to build a house. How can we do that?
Dutch: However, people said that we have to hunt Masquerpets if we want to build a house. How can we do that?

English: Could you please help our family?
Dutch: Could you please help our family?

English: Thank you! Then please bring me drying Rootioe. You can get them from any Masquerpet as far as I know.
Dutch: Thank you! Then please bring me drying Rootioe. You can get them from any Masquerpet as far as I know.

English: You are so cruel...
Dutch: You are so cruel...

English: Thank you, thank you... Thank you very much!
Dutch: Thank you, thank you... Thank you very much!

English: We still are missing some... Please bring me more. Please.
Dutch: We still are missing some... Please bring me more. Please.

English: Please bring me drying Rootioe. You can get them from any Masquerpet as far as I know.
Dutch: Please bring me drying Rootioe. You can get them from any Masquerpet as far as I know.

English: Build Love House -ChiChi-
Dutch: Build Love House -ChiChi-

English: Hello! I am ChiChi, the daughter of Poul, who is standing over there. Our family wants to move to here because my daddy loves this place very much, but...
Dutch: Hello! I am ChiChi, the daughter of Poul, who is standing over there. Our family wants to move to here because my daddy loves this place very much, but...

English: Thank you! Then please bring me drying Rootioe. You can get it from any Masquerpet as far as I know.
Dutch: Thank you! Then please bring me drying Rootioe. You can get it from any Masquerpet as far as I know.

English: Build Love House -PiPi-
Dutch: Build Love House -PiPi-

English: Hello! I am PiPi, the son of Poul , who is standing over there. Our family wants to move to here because my daddy loves this place very much, but...
Dutch: Hello! I am PiPi, the son of Poul , who is standing over there. Our family wants to move to here because my daddy loves this place very much, but...

English: New Puppy Yorrn
Dutch: New Puppy Yorrn

English: Excuse me, can I talk to you for a moment?
Dutch: Excuse me, can I talk to you for a moment?

English: The pretty lady beside me is Losha, my elder sister. I am her younger sister, Loyah.
Dutch: The pretty lady beside me is Losha, my elder sister. I am her younger sister, Loyah.

English: My sister has a very cute puppy, but unfortunately, he's gone missing! She originally found the puppy up in the mountains.
Dutch: My sister has a very cute puppy, but unfortunately, he's gone missing! She originally found the puppy up in the mountains.

English: When she first saw the puppy, it was cold and starving. So she brought it home and took care of it, but suddenly it disappeared one day.
Dutch: When she first saw the puppy, it was cold and starving. So she brought it home and took care of it, but suddenly it disappeared one day.

English: Since then, my sister has been looking everywhere for the puppy. She doesn't eat or drink or sleep. Would you please help my sister find her lost puppy?
Dutch: Since then, my sister has been looking everywhere for the puppy. She doesn't eat or drink or sleep. Would you please help my sister find her lost puppy?

English: Great! She found the puppy somewhere in the middle of Leren Mountains where the Grownup Lawolfs live. Maybe the puppy is trying to find it's way home?
Dutch: Great! She found the puppy somewhere in the middle of Leren Mountains where the Grownup Lawolfs live. Maybe the puppy is trying to find it's way home?

English: How could you refuse the request from a lady? You have no social manners! Have you no shame?!
Dutch: How could you refuse the request from a lady? You have no social manners! Have you no shame?!

English: Yorrn! Where did you find him? In the mountains!? I knew it! He was probably trying to find his way home! Welcome back, Yorrn!
Dutch: Yorrn! Where did you find him? In the mountains!? I knew it! He was probably trying to find his way home! Welcome back, Yorrn!

English: Have you found Yorrn? No? Well, please keep looking! I'm worried about my sister!
Dutch: Have you found Yorrn? No? Well, please keep looking! I'm worried about my sister!

English: Travel to the middle of Leren Mountains, near the Grownup Lawolfs. Find Losha's lost puppy, and return to Loyah.
Dutch: Travel to the middle of Leren Mountains, near the Grownup Lawolfs. Find Losha's lost puppy, and return to Loyah.

English: Trouble-Maker in Pumpkin Village
