Dutch: Trouble-Maker in Pumpkin Village

English: Hey there, I have a problem. Can you help me?
Dutch: Hey there, I have a problem. Can you help me?

English: Actually I have 2 kids, one daughter and one son. My daughter has gone missing!
Dutch: Actually I have 2 kids, one daughter and one son. My daughter has gone missing!

English: This was several years ago with some other missing children... So, my son is the only child I have left. However today... Today he disappeared too!
Dutch: This was several years ago with some other missing children... So, my son is the only child I have left. However today... Today he disappeared too!

English: Both of my kids are now missing. I feel like I can't go on living. Please, will you help me find my son?
Dutch: Both of my kids are now missing. I feel like I can't go on living. Please, will you help me find my son?

English: You're amazing! My son used to love the Pumpkin Patch. You should start your search there.
Dutch: You're amazing! My son used to love the Pumpkin Patch. You should start your search there.

English: If you will not help me, then I have no other choice…
Dutch: If you will not help me, then I have no other choice…

English: Hey, who are you? What? My mom is worried about me? What else is new…? Ugh, fine. I'll go back and let her know I'm okay.
Dutch: Hey, who are you? What? My mom is worried about me? What else is new…? Ugh, fine. I'll go back and let her know I'm okay.

English: I am just watching those pumpkin heads. Aren't they cool? I wish I had one!
Dutch: I am just watching those pumpkin heads. Aren't they cool? I wish I had one!

English: Travel to Pumpkin Town and search for Mayun, JeongHwa's son.
Dutch: Travel to Pumpkin Town and search for Mayun, JeongHwa's son.

English: Doridori Sushi
Dutch: Doridori Sushi

English: Finally! The time has come to learn how to make Doridori Sushi. I just need some ingredients!
Dutch: Finally! The time has come to learn how to make Doridori Sushi. I just need some ingredients!

English: I'll need to practice the recipe so that I can master it. Oh boy, Doridori Sushi is the best sushi in Madrigal! I can't wait!
Dutch: I'll need to practice the recipe so that I can master it. Oh boy, Doridori Sushi is the best sushi in Madrigal! I can't wait!

English: Tell you what, if you help me, I will give you some of this fantastic sushi. How's that sound?
Dutch: Tell you what, if you help me, I will give you some of this fantastic sushi. How's that sound?

English: I knew you wouldn't be able to resist! Now, bring me the following materials: 12 Doridoma Keratins and 5 Mushpang Secretion. You can get them from Small Doridomas and Captain Mushpangs.
Dutch: I knew you wouldn't be able to resist! Now, bring me the following materials: 12 Doridoma Keratins and 5 Mushpang Secretion. You can get them from Small Doridomas and Captain Mushpangs.

English: You have no idea how delicious my sushi is. Oh well. Your loss!
Dutch: You have no idea how delicious my sushi is. Oh well. Your loss!

English: Ah ha! There we go! Your order is ready! I even autographed it in wasabi! Careful, it's SPICY!
Dutch: Ah ha! There we go! Your order is ready! I even autographed it in wasabi! Careful, it's SPICY!

English: I know they can be hard to find, but I'd really like to learn to make it sometime this year. Hurry up, pal!
Dutch: I know they can be hard to find, but I'd really like to learn to make it sometime this year. Hurry up, pal!

English: Collect 12 Doridoma Keratins and 5 Mushpang Secretion from Small Doridomas and Captain Mushpangs. Return to Sotta when you have the ingredients.
Dutch: Collect 12 Doridoma Keratins and 5 Mushpang Secretion from Small Doridomas and Captain Mushpangs. Return to Sotta when you have the ingredients.

English: Successor of Hero -Master-
Dutch: Successor of Hero -Master-

English: So you think you're ready to become a Knight? It isn't easy, but since you've made it this far I think you're up to the challenge.
Dutch: So you think you're ready to become a Knight? It isn't easy, but since you've made it this far I think you're up to the challenge.

English: First, a simple test of your skills in combat to see if you are qualified.
Dutch: First, a simple test of your skills in combat to see if you are qualified.

English: Go to KhipRa and hunt down $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s. Not the Small ones, or the Giants, just regular $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s. That should be easy enough.
Dutch: Go to KhipRa and hunt down $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s. Not the Small ones, or the Giants, just regular $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s. That should be easy enough.

English: Good luck, my friend. I'll be watching.
Dutch: Good luck, my friend. I'll be watching.

English: Giving up already? But this is the easy part.
Dutch: Giving up already? But this is the easy part.

English: Excellent work, Mercenary! Now you're on your way to becoming a Knight.
Dutch: Excellent work, Mercenary! Now you're on your way to becoming a Knight.

English: To commemorate this day, I have something for you.
Dutch: To commemorate this day, I have something for you.

English: Exactly 20 Drillers, Squire. That's what you'll need to take your first steps to Knighthood.
Dutch: Exactly 20 Drillers, Squire. That's what you'll need to take your first steps to Knighthood.

English: Corel is your master, young Mercenary. I can not help you.
Dutch: Corel is your master, young Mercenary. I can not help you.

English: Hunt Down 20 regular Drillers and return to Karandur in Darken City.
Dutch: Hunt Down 20 regular Drillers and return to Karandur in Darken City.

English: Successor of Hero -Helmet-
Dutch: Successor of Hero -Helmet-

English: This letter of recommendation is proof of your achievements thus far. Guard it as you would your own life.
Dutch: This letter of recommendation is proof of your achievements thus far. Guard it as you would your own life.

English: Take it to Hormes, the Knight Sage. He resides at the The Fountain of Dead Person in the Northern Leren Mountains.
Dutch: Take it to Hormes, the Knight Sage. He resides at the The Fountain of Dead Person in the Northern Leren Mountains.

English: Before you go, though, I want you to find Kindler, a grave-robber. He's hiding out near the Clockworks' Cage, South of Darken City.
Dutch: Before you go, though, I want you to find Kindler, a grave-robber. He's hiding out near the Clockworks' Cage, South of Darken City.

English: I believe he has information on the Golden Helmet of Billaon. Retrieve it by any means, and take it to Hormes along with your letter.
Dutch: I believe he has information on the Golden Helmet of Billaon. Retrieve it by any means, and take it to Hormes along with your letter.

English: May the courage of Billaon be with you always.
Dutch: May the courage of Billaon be with you always.

English: You've already come so far, why give up now?
Dutch: You've already come so far, why give up now?

English: My word! This… this is the Golden Helmet of Billaon! We thought it had been lost forever!
Dutch: My word! This… this is the Golden Helmet of Billaon! We thought it had been lost forever!

English: No one had seen it since that grave-robbing scoundrel Kindler stole it and hid it away. Thank you, you're truly remarkable!
Dutch: No one had seen it since that grave-robbing scoundrel Kindler stole it and hid it away. Thank you, you're truly remarkable!

English: You have a question? Out with it, quickly. I have no time to waste with idle chatter.
Dutch: You have a question? Out with it, quickly. I have no time to waste with idle chatter.

English: Find Kindler and use whatever information he has to locate the Golden Helmet. Then take it, and your letter, to Hormes, the Knight Sage at the The Fountain of Dead Person in Flaris.
Dutch: Find Kindler and use whatever information he has to locate the Golden Helmet. Then take it, and your letter, to Hormes, the Knight Sage at the The Fountain of Dead Person in Flaris.

English: Successor of Hero -Scroll-
Dutch: Successor of Hero -Scroll-

English: I deeply appreciate what you've already done, but alas, the Helmet's journey does not end here.
Dutch: I deeply appreciate what you've already done, but alas, the Helmet's journey does not end here.

English: It belongs with the Hersan Kurmin, in the Plain of Bubble.
Dutch: It belongs with the Hersan Kurmin, in the Plain of Bubble.

English: The Kurmin Family has managed the house and relics of Billaon for generations. I'm sure they would reward you handsomely for its return.
Dutch: The Kurmin Family has managed the house and relics of Billaon for generations. I'm sure they would reward you handsomely for its return.

English: Time is a-wasting, Mercenary! Hurry along, now!
Dutch: Time is a-wasting, Mercenary! Hurry along, now!

English: No time to be showered with the appreciation and riches of a wealthy family? Very well, then...
Dutch: No time to be showered with the appreciation and riches of a wealthy family? Very well, then...

English: Oh my… I can't believe it.... I've been looking for this for years. Thank you, thank you very much!
Dutch: Oh my… I can't believe it.... I've been looking for this for years. Thank you, thank you very much!

English: I'd like to give you something for bringing this back to the Kurmin family.
Dutch: I'd like to give you something for bringing this back to the Kurmin family.

English: This Scroll has only been passed down to the Knights in my family line, until now. I'd like you to have it.
Dutch: This Scroll has only been passed down to the Knights in my family line, until now. I'd like you to have it.

English: What nice weather! Oh, I'm sorry, did you need to speak with me?
Dutch: What nice weather! Oh, I'm sorry, did you need to speak with me?

English: Go to the Plain of Bubble to meet Kurmin and give her the Golden Helmet.
Dutch: Go to the Plain of Bubble to meet Kurmin and give her the Golden Helmet.

English: Successor of Hero -Altar-
Dutch: Successor of Hero -Altar-

English: To show my gratitude, I’ll help you further along your way towards becoming a Knight.
Dutch: To show my gratitude, I’ll help you further along your way towards becoming a Knight.

English: You’ll need to visit the Altar of Knight at Magmient in Darkon 3.
Dutch: You’ll need to visit the Altar of Knight at Magmient in Darkon 3.

English: Lobiet, the Knight Priest, will recognize the scroll I’ve given you…
Dutch: Lobiet, the Knight Priest, will recognize the scroll I’ve given you…

English: Retrieve the 8 Soulstones from regular Wheelems and take them to Lobiet.
Dutch: Retrieve the 8 Soulstones from regular Wheelems and take them to Lobiet.

English: Good luck, Mercenary.
Dutch: Good luck, Mercenary.

English: I know it’s a challenge, but I assure you, the reward is worth it.
Dutch: I know it’s a challenge, but I assure you, the reward is worth it.

English: I haven’t a clue why those Wheelems took the stones, but nevertheless, thank Billaon you’ve returned them.
Dutch: I haven’t a clue why those Wheelems took the stones, but nevertheless, thank Billaon you’ve returned them.

English: The Souls of the Heroes can rest, thanks to you.
Dutch: The Souls of the Heroes can rest, thanks to you.

English: What brings you to this holy Altar for the souls of Heroes?
Dutch: What brings you to this holy Altar for the souls of Heroes?

English: Hunt down 8 regular Wheelems (not Bouncing or Rough) and retrieve 8 Soulstones from them.
Dutch: Hunt down 8 regular Wheelems (not Bouncing or Rough) and retrieve 8 Soulstones from them.

English: Successor of Hero -Guardian-
Dutch: Successor of Hero -Guardian-

English: This is the Mark of Heroes. It is a special sigil from the Guardian of the Knight’s Altar that denotes the wearer as a successor of Knight Hero.
Dutch: This is the Mark of Heroes. It is a special sigil from the Guardian of the Knight’s Altar that denotes the wearer as a successor of Knight Hero.

English: You only need one more item to finally become a Knight. You will find it in Guardiane.
Dutch: You only need one more item to finally become a Knight. You will find it in Guardiane.

English: In Guardiane, in the Guardian's Room, you will find a spirit called the Venel Guardian.
Dutch: In Guardiane, in the Guardian's Room, you will find a spirit called the Venel Guardian.

English: Defeat this spirit, and take his heart. This will be your final test.
Dutch: Defeat this spirit, and take his heart. This will be your final test.

English: Once you have completed this task, present the heart to Boneper, the Knight Guardian.
Dutch: Once you have completed this task, present the heart to Boneper, the Knight Guardian.

English: I wish you luck, Mercenary!
Dutch: I wish you luck, Mercenary!

English: You’re almost finished, Mercenary. Don’t give up now.
Dutch: You’re almost finished, Mercenary. Don’t give up now.

English: Well done! I now officially bestow the title of Knight upon you.
Dutch: Well done! I now officially bestow the title of Knight upon you.

English: Billaon, please bless and encourage this Knight as they follow your will!
Dutch: Billaon, please bless and encourage this Knight as they follow your will!

English: Only one recognized as a Knight may pass. Please turn back.
Dutch: Only one recognized as a Knight may pass. Please turn back.

English: Defeat the Venel Guardian, take his heart, and present it to Boneper the Knight Guardian.
Dutch: Defeat the Venel Guardian, take his heart, and present it to Boneper the Knight Guardian.

English: So you think you're ready to become a Blade? It isn't easy, but since you've made it this far I think you're up to the challenge.
Dutch: So you think you're ready to become a Blade? It isn't easy, but since you've made it this far I think you're up to the challenge.

English: Good luck, warrior. I'll be watching.
Dutch: Good luck, warrior. I'll be watching.

English: Quitting already? But this is the easy part.
Dutch: Quitting already? But this is the easy part.

English: Hmm... Good job, I knew you could do this! Now you are qualified as a successor.
Dutch: Hmm... Good job, I knew you could do this! Now you are qualified as a successor.

English: Congratulations! You passed the first test.
Dutch: Congratulations! You passed the first test.

English: Exactly 20 Drillers, Mercenary. That's what you'll need to take your first steps to becoming a Blade.
Dutch: Exactly 20 Drillers, Mercenary. That's what you'll need to take your first steps to becoming a Blade.

English: Karandur is your master, young Mercenary. I can not help you.
Dutch: Karandur is your master, young Mercenary. I can not help you.

English: Hunt Down 20 Drillers and return to Corel in Darken City.
Dutch: Hunt Down 20 Drillers and return to Corel in Darken City.

English: Successor of Hero -Earring-
Dutch: Successor of Hero -Earring-

English: This letter of recommendation is proof of your achievements as a Blade-in-Training. Guard it as you would your own life.
Dutch: This letter of recommendation is proof of your achievements as a Blade-in-Training. Guard it as you would your own life.

English: Take it to Guabill, the Blade Sage. He resides at the Fountain of Dead Person in the North Leren Mountains.
Dutch: Take it to Guabill, the Blade Sage. He resides at the Fountain of Dead Person in the North Leren Mountains.

English: Before you do that, however, locate the Earring of Heren. It’s hidden somewhere in Heret, in Darkon 3.
Dutch: Before you do that, however, locate the Earring of Heren. It’s hidden somewhere in Heret, in Darkon 3.

English: May the mercy of Heren be with you always.
Dutch: May the mercy of Heren be with you always.

English: Dear me! This… this is Earring of Heren! We thought it had been lost forever!
Dutch: Dear me! This… this is Earring of Heren! We thought it had been lost forever!

English: It had gone missing in Heret somewhere, and no one could find it. Thank you, you're truly remarkable!
Dutch: It had gone missing in Heret somewhere, and no one could find it. Thank you, you're truly remarkable!

English: Your efforts this day will be forever appreciated.
Dutch: Your efforts this day will be forever appreciated.

English: The souls of many people travel to the Fountain of Dead Person. It is the crossroads between life and death.
Dutch: The souls of many people travel to the Fountain of Dead Person. It is the crossroads between life and death.

English: Find the Earring of Heren, hidden somewhere in Heret. Then take it and your letter to Guabrill, the Blade Sage at the Fountain of Dead Person in Flaris.
Dutch: Find the Earring of Heren, hidden somewhere in Heret. Then take it and your letter to Guabrill, the Blade Sage at the Fountain of Dead Person in Flaris.

English: Now to get the Earring back into the right hands, the Manager of the House of Heren.
Dutch: Now to get the Earring back into the right hands, the Manager of the House of Heren.

English: Please deliver it to Ata at the Observatory in Flaris.
Dutch: Please deliver it to Ata at the Observatory in Flaris.

English: His family has managed the House of Heren for generations, and they’ve been seeking this earring for just as long. Possessing it again will give them great relief.
Dutch: His family has managed the House of Heren for generations, and they’ve been seeking this earring for just as long. Possessing it again will give them great relief.

English: Oh, I can just imagine how happy this is going to make them. Hurry along!
Dutch: Oh, I can just imagine how happy this is going to make them. Hurry along!

English: Delivering this earring will not only help Ata’s family, but I’m sure they’d be willing to help you in your quest. Please, reconsider.
Dutch: Delivering this earring will not only help Ata’s family, but I’m sure they’d be willing to help you in your quest. Please, reconsider.

English: It this…? Oh, it is! I can finally go home now! Thank you, thank you!
Dutch: It this…? Oh, it is! I can finally go home now! Thank you, thank you!

English: You don’t know how much this means to my family! We’ve been searching for the Earring for so long and now...forgive me for rambling, I’m just so excited!
Dutch: You don’t know how much this means to my family! We’ve been searching for the Earring for so long and now...forgive me for rambling, I’m just so excited!

English: This Scroll belonged to the Blades in my family line. Since you’re trying to become one, I want you to have it.
Dutch: This Scroll belonged to the Blades in my family line. Since you’re trying to become one, I want you to have it.

English: Full Moon out tonight. Strange things usually happen when that occurs…
Dutch: Full Moon out tonight. Strange things usually happen when that occurs…

English: Deliver the Earring of Heren to Ata at the Observatory in Flaris.
Dutch: Deliver the Earring of Heren to Ata at the Observatory in Flaris.

English: You’ll want to take it to the Blade Priest, Jeperdy. She manages the Altar of Blades in Brekin, Darkon 3.
Dutch: You’ll want to take it to the Blade Priest, Jeperdy. She manages the Altar of Blades in Brekin, Darkon 3.

English: Oh, since you're heading that way, could you retrieve a jewel for her called the Tear of Darkness? A Scorpicon in the Plateau of Silence has it, and we believe it could threaten the Souls of Heroes the Altars protect.
Dutch: Oh, since you're heading that way, could you retrieve a jewel for her called the Tear of Darkness? A Scorpicon in the Plateau of Silence has it, and we believe it could threaten the Souls of Heroes the Altars protect.

English: Please take it to Priest Jeperdy, and perhaps we can investigate it further.
Dutch: Please take it to Priest Jeperdy, and perhaps we can investigate it further.

English: Something this potentially dangerous could bring harm to the Altar of Blade. Please, you must help us retrieve it.
Dutch: Something this potentially dangerous could bring harm to the Altar of Blade. Please, you must help us retrieve it.

English: Hmm, just as I thought. Even Soulstones react to it. This requires much more investigation.
Dutch: Hmm, just as I thought. Even Soulstones react to it. This requires much more investigation.

English: Worry not, young Mercenary. Bringing me the jewel was enough on your part. I’ll do the rest.
Dutch: Worry not, young Mercenary. Bringing me the jewel was enough on your part. I’ll do the rest.

English: What brings you to this holy Altar for the Souls of Heroes?
Dutch: What brings you to this holy Altar for the Souls of Heroes?

English: Take the Tear of Darkness from Scorpicon in Plateau of Silence, Saint Morning, and bring it to Priest Jeperdy in Brekin, Darkon 3.
Dutch: Take the Tear of Darkness from Scorpicon in Plateau of Silence, Saint Morning, and bring it to Priest Jeperdy in Brekin, Darkon 3.

English: Here, take this Mark of the Heroes. It along with one last item will denote your status as a true Blade.
Dutch: Here, take this Mark of the Heroes. It along with one last item will denote your status as a true Blade.

English: In the Guardian's Room, you will find a spirit called the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$.
Dutch: In the Guardian's Room, you will find a spirit called the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$.

English: Once you have completed this task, present the heart to Sencyrit, the Blade Guardian.
Dutch: Once you have completed this task, present the heart to Sencyrit, the Blade Guardian.

English: I wish you luck.
Dutch: I wish you luck.

English: Well done! I now officially bestow the title of Blade upon you.
Dutch: Well done! I now officially bestow the title of Blade upon you.

English: Heren, please bless and encourage this Blade as they follow your will!
Dutch: Heren, please bless and encourage this Blade as they follow your will!

English: Only one recognized as a Blade may pass. Please turn back.
Dutch: Only one recognized as a Blade may pass. Please turn back.

English: Defeat the Venel Guardian, take his heart, and present it to Sencyrit the Blade Guardian in Guardiane.
Dutch: Defeat the Venel Guardian, take his heart, and present it to Sencyrit the Blade Guardian in Guardiane.

English: So you think you're ready to become a Billposter? It isn't easy, but since you've made it this far I think you're up to the challenge.
Dutch: So you think you're ready to become a Billposter? It isn't easy, but since you've made it this far I think you're up to the challenge.

English: Good luck. I'll be watching.
Dutch: Good luck. I'll be watching.

English: Excellent work! Now you're on your way to becoming a Billposter.
Dutch: Excellent work! Now you're on your way to becoming a Billposter.

English: Exactly 20 Drillers. That's what you'll need to take your first steps to becoming a Billposter.
Dutch: Exactly 20 Drillers. That's what you'll need to take your first steps to becoming a Billposter.

English: Ellend is your master, young Assist. I can not help you.
Dutch: Ellend is your master, young Assist. I can not help you.

English: Hunt Down 20 Drillers and return to Ride in Darken City.
Dutch: Hunt Down 20 Drillers and return to Ride in Darken City.

English: Successor of Hero -Hall Document-
Dutch: Successor of Hero -Hall Document-

English: This letter of recommendation is proof of your achievements as a Billposter. Guard it as you would your own life.
Dutch: This letter of recommendation is proof of your achievements as a Billposter. Guard it as you would your own life.

English: Take it to Domek, the Billposter Sage. He resides at Fountain of Dead Person in the Northern Leren Mountains.
Dutch: Take it to Domek, the Billposter Sage. He resides at Fountain of Dead Person in the Northern Leren Mountains.

English: Before you do that, however, retrieve the Hall Document from Hoiren. He's hiding somewhere in the Garden of Rhisis.
Dutch: Before you do that, however, retrieve the Hall Document from Hoiren. He's hiding somewhere in the Garden of Rhisis.

English: Luck be with you.
Dutch: Luck be with you.

English: Your skill must be extraordinary if you were able to take this document from Hoiren, good work!
Dutch: Your skill must be extraordinary if you were able to take this document from Hoiren, good work!

English: The Billposter Hero Roentel originally owned this document, but his pupil Hoiren stole it when he died.
Dutch: The Billposter Hero Roentel originally owned this document, but his pupil Hoiren stole it when he died.

English: Hoiren hid it away, and no one could find it until now. We deeply appreciate your efforts to return it.
Dutch: Hoiren hid it away, and no one could find it until now. We deeply appreciate your efforts to return it.

English: Such a peaceful place...if only these other Sages would stop with their chattering I could get some writing done...
Dutch: Such a peaceful place...if only these other Sages would stop with their chattering I could get some writing done...

English: Retrieve the Hall Document from Hoiren, who is hiding somewhere in the Garden of Rhisis. Then deliver it and your letter to Domek the Billposter Sage. You can find him at the Fountain of Dead Person.
Dutch: Retrieve the Hall Document from Hoiren, who is hiding somewhere in the Garden of Rhisis. Then deliver it and your letter to Domek the Billposter Sage. You can find him at the Fountain of Dead Person.

English: The rightful caretaker of the Hall Document is Segho of the Pesin family. They have been managing Roentel’s Hall of the Martial Arts for generations.
Dutch: The rightful caretaker of the Hall Document is Segho of the Pesin family. They have been managing Roentel’s Hall of the Martial Arts for generations.

English: He is out of the Hall right now, doing some adventuring of his own in Flaris.
Dutch: He is out of the Hall right now, doing some adventuring of his own in Flaris.

English: He’s an accomplished mountaineer, so you may be able to find him in the Leren Mountains. Present him with the Hall Document when you find him.
Dutch: He’s an accomplished mountaineer, so you may be able to find him in the Leren Mountains. Present him with the Hall Document when you find him.

English: Very well, then. Perhaps someone truly worthy of becoming a Billposter will come along to deliver this for me...
Dutch: Very well, then. Perhaps someone truly worthy of becoming a Billposter will come along to deliver this for me...

English: Surprised to run into somebody else this high up. I’m looking for Roentel’s Hall Document, you wouldn’t happen to have heard about it… well, what d’ya know...
Dutch: Surprised to run into somebody else this high up. I’m looking for Roentel’s Hall Document, you wouldn’t happen to have heard about it… well, what d’ya know...

English: Thanks for bringing this back to us, now I can finally get back to the Hall. Say, I knew I had a good reason to bring this along. Let’s see... *rummaging*
Dutch: Thanks for bringing this back to us, now I can finally get back to the Hall. Say, I knew I had a good reason to bring this along. Let’s see... *rummaging*

English: There you go. Every Billposter in my family line possessed this Scroll. Now it’s yours.
Dutch: There you go. Every Billposter in my family line possessed this Scroll. Now it’s yours.

English: Ahh, Leren Mountains. The root of Flaris itself, perfect for surveying every spot on the map.
Dutch: Ahh, Leren Mountains. The root of Flaris itself, perfect for surveying every spot on the map.

English: Deliver the Hall Document to Segho in the Leren Mountains.
Dutch: Deliver the Hall Document to Segho in the Leren Mountains.

English: Head on over to Fera, the Billposter Priest. She manages their Altar in Arians, Darkon 3.
Dutch: Head on over to Fera, the Billposter Priest. She manages their Altar in Arians, Darkon 3.

English: She’s been looking for the Poster of Skill which contains Shadow Avatar, Roentel’s most devastating technique.
Dutch: She’s been looking for the Poster of Skill which contains Shadow Avatar, Roentel’s most devastating technique.

English: Rumor has it that grave-robbers controlling the Steam Walkers have gotten a hold of it. Take it back from them, and get it into Fera’s hands.
Dutch: Rumor has it that grave-robbers controlling the Steam Walkers have gotten a hold of it. Take it back from them, and get it into Fera’s hands.

English: Good luck, friend!
Dutch: Good luck, friend!

English: Someone with evil intentions using Shadow Avatar could lead to catastrophe. Please, reconsider!
Dutch: Someone with evil intentions using Shadow Avatar could lead to catastrophe. Please, reconsider!

English: Well done! People say that only Roentel can use this, but with Billposters like you around, who knows?
Dutch: Well done! People say that only Roentel can use this, but with Billposters like you around, who knows?

English: Until then though, I’ll do my best to protect it.
Dutch: Until then though, I’ll do my best to protect it.

English: Retrieve the Poster of Skill from the Steam Walkers, then bring it to Fera in Arians, Darkon 3.
Dutch: Retrieve the Poster of Skill from the Steam Walkers, then bring it to Fera in Arians, Darkon 3.

English: Here, take this Mark of the Heroes. It along with one last item will denote your status as a true Billposter.
Dutch: Here, take this Mark of the Heroes. It along with one last item will denote your status as a true Billposter.

English: Once you have completed this task, present the heart to Capafe, the Billposter Guardian.
Dutch: Once you have completed this task, present the heart to Capafe, the Billposter Guardian.

English: You’re almost finished, Assist. Don’t give up now.
Dutch: You’re almost finished, Assist. Don’t give up now.

English: Well done! I now officially bestow the title of Billposter upon you.
Dutch: Well done! I now officially bestow the title of Billposter upon you.

English: Roentel, please bless and encourage this Billposter as they follow your will!
Dutch: Roentel, please bless and encourage this Billposter as they follow your will!

English: Only one recognized as a Billposter may pass. Please turn back.
Dutch: Only one recognized as a Billposter may pass. Please turn back.

English: Defeat the guardian spirit, Venel Guardian, and get it's heart. Then please visit Capafe who is the Billposter Guardian.
Dutch: Defeat the guardian spirit, Venel Guardian, and get it's heart. Then please visit Capafe who is the Billposter Guardian.

English: So you think you're ready to become a Ringmaster? It isn't easy, but since you've made it this far I think you're up to the challenge.
Dutch: So you think you're ready to become a Ringmaster? It isn't easy, but since you've made it this far I think you're up to the challenge.

English: I will be watching you.
Dutch: I will be watching you.

English: Excellent work! Now you're on your way to becoming a Ringmaster.
Dutch: Excellent work! Now you're on your way to becoming a Ringmaster.

English: Exactly 20 Drillers. That's what you'll need to take your first steps to becoming a Ringmaster.
Dutch: Exactly 20 Drillers. That's what you'll need to take your first steps to becoming a Ringmaster.

English: Ride is your master, young Assist. I can not help you.
Dutch: Ride is your master, young Assist. I can not help you.

English: Hunt Down 20 Drillers and return to Ellend in Darken City.
Dutch: Hunt Down 20 Drillers and return to Ellend in Darken City.

English: Successor of Hero -Seal-
Dutch: Successor of Hero -Seal-

English: This letter of recommendation is proof of your achievements as a Ringmaster. Guard it as you would your own life.
Dutch: This letter of recommendation is proof of your achievements as a Ringmaster. Guard it as you would your own life.

English: Take it to Clamb, the Ringmaster Sage. He resides at the The Fountain of Dead Person in the Northern Leren Mountains.
Dutch: Take it to Clamb, the Ringmaster Sage. He resides at the The Fountain of Dead Person in the Northern Leren Mountains.

English: Before you do that, however, retrieve the Seal of Aenn from Roy near the Plateau of Silence in Saint Morning.
Dutch: Before you do that, however, retrieve the Seal of Aenn from Roy near the Plateau of Silence in Saint Morning.

English: May Aenn’s mercy be with you always.
Dutch: May Aenn’s mercy be with you always.

English: The Seal of Aenn! Someone’s finally found the Aenn family symbol!
Dutch: The Seal of Aenn! Someone’s finally found the Aenn family symbol!

English: I’d always heard that Roy would steal anything of value, but I never thought he’d have a mind to take the Seal!
Dutch: I’d always heard that Roy would steal anything of value, but I never thought he’d have a mind to take the Seal!

English: Your efforts are most appreciated!
Dutch: Your efforts are most appreciated!

English: You're a long way from a doctor’s office… but I am still a healer of the sick and injured.
Dutch: You're a long way from a doctor’s office… but I am still a healer of the sick and injured.

English: Retrieve the Seal of Aenn from Roy near the Plateau of Silence in Saint Morning, then take it to Clamb, the Ringmaster Sage. You can find him at the Fountain of Dead Person.
Dutch: Retrieve the Seal of Aenn from Roy near the Plateau of Silence in Saint Morning, then take it to Clamb, the Ringmaster Sage. You can find him at the Fountain of Dead Person.

English: Now, deliver the Seal to Teshar, the leader of Kyon Soldiers.
Dutch: Now, deliver the Seal to Teshar, the leader of Kyon Soldiers.

English: Teshar and her Mercenaries can be found in Eastern Flarine.
Dutch: Teshar and her Mercenaries can be found in Eastern Flarine.

English: Make haste!
Dutch: Make haste!

English: The Seal is very important, and you’re one of the only people able to keep it safe. Please, reconsider taking this task.
Dutch: The Seal is very important, and you’re one of the only people able to keep it safe. Please, reconsider taking this task.

English: Greetings, I am Teshar, and I lead Kyon’s company of soldiers for hire. How may I help...oh my. How did you find this? I’ve looked all over Flaris for it.
Dutch: Greetings, I am Teshar, and I lead Kyon’s company of soldiers for hire. How may I help...oh my. How did you find this? I’ve looked all over Flaris for it.

English: In Saint Morning, really? That explains why I never ran across it. Anyway, thank you very much. Please, take this as a token of my appreciation.
Dutch: In Saint Morning, really? That explains why I never ran across it. Anyway, thank you very much. Please, take this as a token of my appreciation.

English: This Scroll was passed down to each Ringmasters in my family. I’d like you to have it.
Dutch: This Scroll was passed down to each Ringmasters in my family. I’d like you to have it.

English: Even though the Kyon are hired soldiers, we do not follow just anyone because of the money. We respect faith and royalty.
Dutch: Even though the Kyon are hired soldiers, we do not follow just anyone because of the money. We respect faith and royalty.

English: Deliver the Seal of Aenn to Teshar in Eastern Flarine.
Dutch: Deliver the Seal of Aenn to Teshar in Eastern Flarine.

English: Now, since you’re going to become a Ringmaster, you should see the Ringmaster Priest, Heedan, in Darkon 3.
Dutch: Now, since you’re going to become a Ringmaster, you should see the Ringmaster Priest, Heedan, in Darkon 3.

English: She’s been trying to track down the Teardrop of Aenn that was stolen by Hunter X.
Dutch: She’s been trying to track down the Teardrop of Aenn that was stolen by Hunter X.

English: If you can get it back, you’d help her out a great deal.
Dutch: If you can get it back, you’d help her out a great deal.

English: But… you must do it if you are to become a Ringmaster.
Dutch: But… you must do it if you are to become a Ringmaster.

English: Great job, now everything is at it should be.
Dutch: Great job, now everything is at it should be.

English: Thank you very much. I will do my best to keep it safe.
Dutch: Thank you very much. I will do my best to keep it safe.

English: I have given you your task, young one. Please do it.
Dutch: I have given you your task, young one. Please do it.

English: $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ is in Darkon 1. Find him, get back the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$, and take it to Heedan in Cendil, Darkon 3.
Dutch: $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$ is in Darkon 1. Find him, get back the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$, and take it to Heedan in Cendil, Darkon 3.

English: Here is the Symbol of the Hero. You have to complete one more task in order to be recognized as a Successor of the Hero.
Dutch: Here is the Symbol of the Hero. You have to complete one more task in order to be recognized as a Successor of the Hero.

English: There is a place called the Room of the Guardian. You can find it in Guardiane. There, the Will of Heroes is protected.
Dutch: There is a place called the Room of the Guardian. You can find it in Guardiane. There, the Will of Heroes is protected.

English: Defeat the guardian spirit, Cardinal Guardian, and retrieve his heart.
Dutch: Defeat the guardian spirit, Cardinal Guardian, and retrieve his heart.

English: Then, deliver the heart to Romvoette, the Ringmaster Guardian in Guardiane.
Dutch: Then, deliver the heart to Romvoette, the Ringmaster Guardian in Guardiane.

English: I wish you luck, Assist.
Dutch: I wish you luck, Assist.

English: You've come all this way just to give up? This is the last step. Please, think this through.
Dutch: You've come all this way just to give up? This is the last step. Please, think this through.

English: Welcome, Assist. You've done very well! Now, I appoint you the Successor of the Ringmaster Hero!
Dutch: Welcome, Assist. You've done very well! Now, I appoint you the Successor of the Ringmaster Hero!

English: Aenn, bless and watch over this person who is following your will, Ringmaster!
Dutch: Aenn, bless and watch over this person who is following your will, Ringmaster!

English: I believe you've come here by mistake, Assist. Have you forgotten your task?
Dutch: I believe you've come here by mistake, Assist. Have you forgotten your task?

English: Defeat the Cardinal Guardian in Guardiane and retrieve his heart. Then visit Romvoette, the Ringmaster Guardian in Guardiane
Dutch: Defeat the Cardinal Guardian in Guardiane and retrieve his heart. Then visit Romvoette, the Ringmaster Guardian in Guardiane

English: So, you think you're ready to become a Successor of the Psykeeper Hero? You've come a long way, Magician. I think you're ready.
Dutch: So, you think you're ready to become a Successor of the Psykeeper Hero? You've come a long way, Magician. I think you're ready.

English: First, we'll need to test your skills in combat if we are to continue down this path.
Dutch: First, we'll need to test your skills in combat if we are to continue down this path.

English: I want you to defeat $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s. Not Small $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s or Giant $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s, just $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s. They are located southwest of the Gouthan Mountains.
Dutch: I want you to defeat $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s. Not Small $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s or Giant $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s, just $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s. They are located southwest of the Gouthan Mountains.

English: I will be watching you, Magician. Good luck!
Dutch: I will be watching you, Magician. Good luck!

English: You're giving up now before you've even started?
Dutch: You're giving up now before you've even started?

English: Yes, very well done, Magician. You've certainly come a long way. You're ready to become a Successor to the Psykeeper Hero.
Dutch: Yes, very well done, Magician. You've certainly come a long way. You're ready to become a Successor to the Psykeeper Hero.

English: I've already given you your task, my friend. You must hurry.
Dutch: I've already given you your task, my friend. You must hurry.

English: Horison tells me you've already chosen the path of the Elementor. I cannot aid you. If you have any questions, please ask her. You can still cancel the other job quest in the Quest Window and come back to me.
Dutch: Horison tells me you've already chosen the path of the Elementor. I cannot aid you. If you have any questions, please ask her. You can still cancel the other job quest in the Quest Window and come back to me.

English: Defeat $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s. Not Small $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s or Giant $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s, just $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s. They are located southwest of the Gouthan Mountains.
Dutch: Defeat $QUEST_END_KILL_COUNT$ $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s. Not Small $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s or Giant $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s, just $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$s. They are located southwest of the Gouthan Mountains.

English: Successor of Hero -Underwear-
Dutch: Successor of Hero -Underwear-

English: Here is your Letter of Recommendation. This shows that I have recognized your potential. Do not lose this document.
Dutch: Here is your Letter of Recommendation. This shows that I have recognized your potential. Do not lose this document.

English: For your next assignment, I need you to retrieve the Magic Underwear of Power from Kynsy who is hiding somewhere near the Erons Factory in Darkon 1.
Dutch: For your next assignment, I need you to retrieve the Magic Underwear of Power from Kynsy who is hiding somewhere near the Erons Factory in Darkon 1.

English: Good luck to you, Magician!
Dutch: Good luck to you, Magician!

English: Are you afraid to walk the path of the Psykeeper? Sure, it's not easy, but I think you have what it takes. Speak with me again if you change your mind.
Dutch: Are you afraid to walk the path of the Psykeeper? Sure, it's not easy, but I think you have what it takes. Speak with me again if you change your mind.

English: Yes, you found them! Amazing! What…? Do I like girl's underwear? What a silly question!
Dutch: Yes, you found them! Amazing! What…? Do I like girl's underwear? What a silly question!

English: Anyway, you did an excellent job acquiring these. I will continue your training immediately.
Dutch: Anyway, you did an excellent job acquiring these. I will continue your training immediately.

English: Well, I certainly look dashing in these! *snicker*
Dutch: Well, I certainly look dashing in these! *snicker*

English: Now, where did I put my underwear...
Dutch: Now, where did I put my underwear...

English: Deliver the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ and the Letter of Recommendation to Cuarine, the Psykeeper Wiseman at the Fountain of Dead Person near the Northern Leren Mountains.
Dutch: Deliver the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ and the Letter of Recommendation to Cuarine, the Psykeeper Wiseman at the Fountain of Dead Person near the Northern Leren Mountains.

English: Alright, so let's move on. Deliver the Magic Underwear of Power to Ryupang in Madren Town
Dutch: Alright, so let's move on. Deliver the Magic Underwear of Power to Ryupang in Madren Town

English: Make haste, Magician!
Dutch: Make haste, Magician!

English: Ryupang NEEDS that underwear! Please, think it over!
Dutch: Ryupang NEEDS that underwear! Please, think it over!

English: Hmmm… yes? What've you go there, young Magician?
Dutch: Hmmm… yes? What've you go there, young Magician?

English: The Magic Underwear of Power! Where did you find them? No matter, the important thing is that we now have this very important relic.
Dutch: The Magic Underwear of Power! Where did you find them? No matter, the important thing is that we now have this very important relic.

English: Take this, my friend. This Stamped Scroll will prove you are worthy to become a Successor of the Psykeeper Hero.
Dutch: Take this, my friend. This Stamped Scroll will prove you are worthy to become a Successor of the Psykeeper Hero.

English: We are the survivors of the Massacre of the Mr. Pumpkins. We became soldiers to fight back and seek our revenge. Curse those Pumpkin-heads!
Dutch: We are the survivors of the Massacre of the Mr. Pumpkins. We became soldiers to fight back and seek our revenge. Curse those Pumpkin-heads!

English: Deliver the Magic Underwear of Power to Ryupang in Madren Town.
Dutch: Deliver the Magic Underwear of Power to Ryupang in Madren Town.

English: No, on to your next challenge, Magician! I need you to speak with someone.
Dutch: No, on to your next challenge, Magician! I need you to speak with someone.

English: Pereb, the Psykeeper Priest, is trying to locate an ancient Relic from the war somewhere in the Cave of Envy in Darkon 2. It's called the Trace of Offerep.
Dutch: Pereb, the Psykeeper Priest, is trying to locate an ancient Relic from the war somewhere in the Cave of Envy in Darkon 2. It's called the Trace of Offerep.

English: Well, what are you waiting for? Get moving!
Dutch: Well, what are you waiting for? Get moving!

English: Don't give up now, Magician. You're so close!
Dutch: Don't give up now, Magician. You're so close!

English: I am grateful that you've brought the Trace of Offerep, Magician. I have been searching for this for a very long time.
Dutch: I am grateful that you've brought the Trace of Offerep, Magician. I have been searching for this for a very long time.

English: You possess great potential, young Magician. Keep working hard and you will realize your dream.
Dutch: You possess great potential, young Magician. Keep working hard and you will realize your dream.

English: This is the alter where the Souls of Heroes are protected. What can I do for you, young one?
Dutch: This is the alter where the Souls of Heroes are protected. What can I do for you, young one?

English: Locate the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$, and present it to Pereb, the Psykeeper Priest at the Altar of Psykeeper in Darkon 3.
Dutch: Locate the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$, and present it to Pereb, the Psykeeper Priest at the Altar of Psykeeper in Darkon 3.

English: This is the Symbol of the Hero. There is only one more task to complete before you can be named a Successor of the Psykeeper Hero.
Dutch: This is the Symbol of the Hero. There is only one more task to complete before you can be named a Successor of the Psykeeper Hero.

English: There is a place called the Room of the Guardian. You'll find it in Guardiane. There, the Will of the Heroes is protected.
Dutch: There is a place called the Room of the Guardian. You'll find it in Guardiane. There, the Will of the Heroes is protected.

English: You must confront the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$, who resides there, and retrieve his heart.
Dutch: You must confront the $QUEST_END_KILL_NAME$, who resides there, and retrieve his heart.

English: Deliver the Venel Heart to Shyniff, the Psykeeper Guardian in Guardiane.
Dutch: Deliver the Venel Heart to Shyniff, the Psykeeper Guardian in Guardiane.

English: May the wisdom of the Heroes guide you, young one.
Dutch: May the wisdom of the Heroes guide you, young one.

English: Quitting now would be foolish, young one. Give it some though and speak to me again should you change your mind.
Dutch: Quitting now would be foolish, young one. Give it some though and speak to me again should you change your mind.

English: Welcome, Magician. Your journey to becoming a Psykeeper is now complete. I now appoint you, a Successor of the Psykeeper Hero!
Dutch: Welcome, Magician. Your journey to becoming a Psykeeper is now complete. I now appoint you, a Successor of the Psykeeper Hero!

English: Offerep, please guide and protect this brave soul who is following in your path, Psykeeper!
Dutch: Offerep, please guide and protect this brave soul who is following in your path, Psykeeper!

English: I am awaiting a new Successor to the Psykeeper Hero. If that is you, I believe you may be forgetting something, young one.
Dutch: I am awaiting a new Successor to the Psykeeper Hero. If that is you, I believe you may be forgetting something, young one.

English: Defeat the Venel Guardian, and deliver the Venel Heart to Shyniff, the Psykeeper Guardian in Guardiane.
Dutch: Defeat the Venel Guardian, and deliver the Venel Heart to Shyniff, the Psykeeper Guardian in Guardiane.

English: So, you think you're ready to become a Successor of the Elementor Hero? You've come a long way, Magician. I think you're ready.
Dutch: So, you think you're ready to become a Successor of the Elementor Hero? You've come a long way, Magician. I think you're ready.

English: Yes, very well done, Magician. You've certainly come a long way. You're ready to become a Successor to the Elementor Hero.
Dutch: Yes, very well done, Magician. You've certainly come a long way. You're ready to become a Successor to the Elementor Hero.

English: You've already made a decision to become a Successor of the Psykeeper Hero. You have to visit Ellend to continue your training.
Dutch: You've already made a decision to become a Successor of the Psykeeper Hero. You have to visit Ellend to continue your training.

English: Successor of Hero -Feather-
Dutch: Successor of Hero -Feather-

English: Here is your Letter of Recommendation. This shows that the master recognizes your potential. Do not lose this document.
Dutch: Here is your Letter of Recommendation. This shows that the master recognizes your potential. Do not lose this document.

English: For your next assignment, I'll need you to get the Feather of Magic Power which is located somewhere in Magmient, in Darkon 3.
Dutch: For your next assignment, I'll need you to get the Feather of Magic Power which is located somewhere in Magmient, in Darkon 3.

English: Once you've located the feather, present it to Cuzrill, the Elementor Wiseman near the Fountain of Dead person in Flaris.
Dutch: Once you've located the feather, present it to Cuzrill, the Elementor Wiseman near the Fountain of Dead person in Flaris.

English: I pray the mercy of Lillip will always be with you.
Dutch: I pray the mercy of Lillip will always be with you.

English: Don't underestimate yourself, Magician. The path is meant to be difficult. Let me know if you change your mind.
Dutch: Don't underestimate yourself, Magician. The path is meant to be difficult. Let me know if you change your mind.

English: An, yes. The Feather of Magic power! It is said that this was crafted by Lillip and made from the feather of a Luia. It can double your magic power.
Dutch: An, yes. The Feather of Magic power! It is said that this was crafted by Lillip and made from the feather of a Luia. It can double your magic power.

English: I sure know a lot about it, don't I? Hahaha! Thank you for finding this, Magician.
Dutch: I sure know a lot about it, don't I? Hahaha! Thank you for finding this, Magician.

English: I am just as clever as the Elementor Priest! Maybe I'm even more clever than her! I am surrounded by jealous people!
Dutch: I am just as clever as the Elementor Priest! Maybe I'm even more clever than her! I am surrounded by jealous people!

English: Locate the Feather of Magic Power and present it to Cuzrill, the Elementor Wiseman near the Fountain of Dead person in Flaris.
Dutch: Locate the Feather of Magic Power and present it to Cuzrill, the Elementor Wiseman near the Fountain of Dead person in Flaris.

English: Now, I need you to deliver this relic to Parine, Tina's helper at Saint City Station.
Dutch: Now, I need you to deliver this relic to Parine, Tina's helper at Saint City Station.

English: Take good care of that relic, and good luck!
Dutch: Take good care of that relic, and good luck!

English: What? You did all this just to get your filthy hands on that relic? That's just… awful. I'm speechless.
Dutch: What? You did all this just to get your filthy hands on that relic? That's just… awful. I'm speechless.

English: You've found it! Oh thank you, thank you, thank you! Finally, I have it! The Feather of Magic Power!
Dutch: You've found it! Oh thank you, thank you, thank you! Finally, I have it! The Feather of Magic Power!

English: You must have been through a lot to acquire this for me. Here, I have something for you…
Dutch: You must have been through a lot to acquire this for me. Here, I have something for you…

English: Take this, my friend. This Stamp Scroll will prove you are worthy to become a Successor of the Elementor Hero.
Dutch: Take this, my friend. This Stamp Scroll will prove you are worthy to become a Successor of the Elementor Hero.

English: I am the scion of Lillip. At the moment, I am learning from Tina about managing the Saint City Station. Why are you here? Are you forgetting something?
Dutch: I am the scion of Lillip. At the moment, I am learning from Tina about managing the Saint City Station. Why are you here? Are you forgetting something?

English: Deliver the Feather of Magic Power to Parine, Tina's helper at Saint City Station.
Dutch: Deliver the Feather of Magic Power to Parine, Tina's helper at Saint City Station.

English: You'll need to speak with Condram, the Elementor Priest in order to continue your journey. However, fir you'll have to complete another task.
Dutch: You'll need to speak with Condram, the Elementor Priest in order to continue your journey. However, fir you'll have to complete another task.

English: Elementor Priest Condram is looking for something very important. It is the Perfume of Lillip, which is rumored to be somewhere in Heret, in Darkon 3.
Dutch: Elementor Priest Condram is looking for something very important. It is the Perfume of Lillip, which is rumored to be somewhere in Heret, in Darkon 3.

English: You… won't? Why not? It would be a shame to let someone as gifted as you simply give up. Speak to me again when you're ready.
Dutch: You… won't? Why not? It would be a shame to let someone as gifted as you simply give up. Speak to me again when you're ready.

English: Ah yes, the Perfume of Lillip. I have been looking for this for a very long time.
Dutch: Ah yes, the Perfume of Lillip. I have been looking for this for a very long time.

English: Thank you very much, Magician. Now the relics of the Elementor Hero are safe.
Dutch: Thank you very much, Magician. Now the relics of the Elementor Hero are safe.

English: This is the altar where we protect the Souls of the Heroes. What can I do for you, my friend?
Dutch: This is the altar where we protect the Souls of the Heroes. What can I do for you, my friend?

English: Find the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ and deliver the Stamped Scroll to Priest Condram at the Altar of Elementor in Darkon 3.
Dutch: Find the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$ and deliver the Stamped Scroll to Priest Condram at the Altar of Elementor in Darkon 3.

English: This is the Symbol of the Hero. There is only one more task to complete before you can be named a Successor of the Elementor Hero.
Dutch: This is the Symbol of the Hero. There is only one more task to complete before you can be named a Successor of the Elementor Hero.

English: Deliver the Venel Heart to Wendien, the Elementor Guardian in Guardiane.
Dutch: Deliver the Venel Heart to Wendien, the Elementor Guardian in Guardiane.

English: Maybe the wisdom of the Heroes guide you, my friend.
Dutch: Maybe the wisdom of the Heroes guide you, my friend.

English: Welcome, Magician. Your journey to becoming an Elementor is complete. I now appoint you, a Successor of the Elementor Hero!
Dutch: Welcome, Magician. Your journey to becoming an Elementor is complete. I now appoint you, a Successor of the Elementor Hero!

English: Lillip! Bless and guide this brave soul who is following your will! Elementor!
Dutch: Lillip! Bless and guide this brave soul who is following your will! Elementor!

English: I am awaiting a new Successor to the Elementor Hero. If that is you, I believe you may be forgetting something, Magician.
Dutch: I am awaiting a new Successor to the Elementor Hero. If that is you, I believe you may be forgetting something, Magician.

English: Defeat the Venel Guardian, and deliver the Venel Heart to Wendien, the Elementor Guardian in Guardiane.
Dutch: Defeat the Venel Guardian, and deliver the Venel Heart to Wendien, the Elementor Guardian in Guardiane.

English: Sound which calls the Dark
Dutch: Sound which calls the Dark

English: Have you ever heard the horrible sound from Mars Mine? That strange and hair-raising sound… It's spooky!
Dutch: Have you ever heard the horrible sound from Mars Mine? That strange and hair-raising sound… It's spooky!

English: Maybe you haven't, but you will. Muahahaha! I heard it clearly! I hope it's not the sound I think it is...
Dutch: Maybe you haven't, but you will. Muahahaha! I heard it clearly! I hope it's not the sound I think it is...

English: (After a long hesitation...) Listen, if it is the sound I think it is, we have a big problem. Well, more like a disaster.
Dutch: (After a long hesitation...) Listen, if it is the sound I think it is, we have a big problem. Well, more like a disaster.

English: (Holds your hands suddenly… creepy, right?) So, please, will you do me a favor?
Dutch: (Holds your hands suddenly… creepy, right?) So, please, will you do me a favor?

English: Great, please investigate the entrance to the Mars Mine, then return to me.
Dutch: Great, please investigate the entrance to the Mars Mine, then return to me.

English: Not interested, huh? Fine, go play with Aibatts or something…
Dutch: Not interested, huh? Fine, go play with Aibatts or something…

English: Unfortunately it's exactly what I thought... Darn, I am still missing something.
Dutch: Unfortunately it's exactly what I thought... Darn, I am still missing something.

English: Please just investigate the entrance. It can't be that hard…
Dutch: Please just investigate the entrance. It can't be that hard…

English: Investigate the entrance to the Mars Mine.
Dutch: Investigate the entrance to the Mars Mine.

English: Phantom of Fear
Dutch: Phantom of Fear

English: I cannot be sure by only investigating the entrance. I need more detailed information…
Dutch: I cannot be sure by only investigating the entrance. I need more detailed information…

English: (Looks at you imploringly) Would you please, please bring me more detailed information?
Dutch: (Looks at you imploringly) Would you please, please bring me more detailed information?

English: I wouldn't ask if it weren't very, very important. Will you help?
Dutch: I wouldn't ask if it weren't very, very important. Will you help?

English: Thank you! This time, investigate the inside of the Mars Mine. Also, please investigate the masquerpets there.
Dutch: Thank you! This time, investigate the inside of the Mars Mine. Also, please investigate the masquerpets there.

English: It's not like I'm asking you for your first born child…
Dutch: It's not like I'm asking you for your first born child…

English: Oh no… We're doomed! What are we going to do!?
Dutch: Oh no… We're doomed! What are we going to do!?

English: I know it sounds dangerous, but you've got to be brave. This is very important.
Dutch: I know it sounds dangerous, but you've got to be brave. This is very important.

English: Investigate the inside of the Mars Mine. Once inside, investigate the masquerpets you find.
Dutch: Investigate the inside of the Mars Mine. Once inside, investigate the masquerpets you find.

English: Serus Uriel
Dutch: Serus Uriel

English: Now I'm sure it's what I feared. I still I can't do anything about it. I need evidence... Hmm...
Dutch: Now I'm sure it's what I feared. I still I can't do anything about it. I need evidence... Hmm...

English: (Thinking for a while, and then, suddenly...)
Dutch: (Thinking for a while, and then, suddenly...)

English: Yes! That's it! There must be evidence in the Mars Mine! We have to find it!
Dutch: Yes! That's it! There must be evidence in the Mars Mine! We have to find it!

English: If the seal is broken, the broken pieces of the magic key must be there.
Dutch: If the seal is broken, the broken pieces of the magic key must be there.

English: Now I know what we must do! Would you please help me once more, friend?
Dutch: Now I know what we must do! Would you please help me once more, friend?

English: Thank you! Collect the 5 pieces of the broken key somewhere in the Mars Mine, and return to me
Dutch: Thank you! Collect the 5 pieces of the broken key somewhere in the Mars Mine, and return to me

English: Are you serious? What part of *doomed* did you not understand?
Dutch: Are you serious? What part of *doomed* did you not understand?

English: It's all clear now. It is exactly what I was afraid of. Serus Uriel has returned. The Phantom of Fear.
Dutch: It's all clear now. It is exactly what I was afraid of. Serus Uriel has returned. The Phantom of Fear.

English: Keep looking! The pieces of the broken key must be somewhere inside the Mars Mine!
Dutch: Keep looking! The pieces of the broken key must be somewhere inside the Mars Mine!

English: Collect 5 pieces of the broken key in the Mars Mine and return to Dr. Estly.
Dutch: Collect 5 pieces of the broken key in the Mars Mine and return to Dr. Estly.

English: Dangerous War
Dutch: Dangerous War

English: As long as Serus Uriel is still alive, it will be impossible to avoid all out war…
Dutch: As long as Serus Uriel is still alive, it will be impossible to avoid all out war…

English: I do not want to stain Flaris with blood again. That's the last thing we need right now.
Dutch: I do not want to stain Flaris with blood again. That's the last thing we need right now.

English: Her power can't possibly be as strong as before, otherwise she wouldn't be hiding in the mine.
Dutch: Her power can't possibly be as strong as before, otherwise she wouldn't be hiding in the mine.

English: I need your help again. Can you help me protect our peaceful Flaris?
Dutch: I need your help again. Can you help me protect our peaceful Flaris?

English: I do not know exactly where it is, but there is a chamber for Serus Uriel. In front of that room, there are five guardians that protect it. Please defeat them first.
Dutch: I do not know exactly where it is, but there is a chamber for Serus Uriel. In front of that room, there are five guardians that protect it. Please defeat them first.

English: What the hell is more important than this? I really cannot understand!
Dutch: What the hell is more important than this? I really cannot understand!

English: Hmm... You are really great. I will appoint you as a punitive force of Serus Uriel. Here is the key. Please take it.
Dutch: Hmm... You are really great. I will appoint you as a punitive force of Serus Uriel. Here is the key. Please take it.

English: From now on, the conflict is with Serus Uriel. Please, head back there and use the key to open the door to her chamber.
Dutch: From now on, the conflict is with Serus Uriel. Please, head back there and use the key to open the door to her chamber.

English: Don't give up now, you must defeat her.
Dutch: Don't give up now, you must defeat her.

English: Don't underestimate the 5 guardians. They are very powerful.
Dutch: Don't underestimate the 5 guardians. They are very powerful.

English: Defeat the 5 Veduque Guardians in front of Serus Uriel's Chamber and return to Dr. Estly to acquire the Mars Dungeon Key.
Dutch: Defeat the 5 Veduque Guardians in front of Serus Uriel's Chamber and return to Dr. Estly to acquire the Mars Dungeon Key.

English: Existence which Desire Summoned
Dutch: Existence which Desire Summoned

English: So you're interested in challenging Clockworks, huh? What are you, nuts?!
Dutch: So you're interested in challenging Clockworks, huh? What are you, nuts?!

English: Okay...if you insist. However before I help you, I need to make sure you aren't just going to walk in there and fall over dead. I need to make sure you're worthy. Okay?
Dutch: Okay...if you insist. However before I help you, I need to make sure you aren't just going to walk in there and fall over dead. I need to make sure you're worthy. Okay?

English: Great! Please visit Dr. Est. He is studying the ecology of Darkon, in the nearby Gouthan Mountains of Darkon1.
Dutch: Great! Please visit Dr. Est. He is studying the ecology of Darkon, in the nearby Gouthan Mountains of Darkon1.

English: Backing out already? Hahaha! I knew you were all talk…
Dutch: Backing out already? Hahaha! I knew you were all talk…

English: Oh, did the Mayor of Darkon send you? You must be the one he was talking about that's crazy enough to challenge Clockworks. Here, you'll need this book.
Dutch: Oh, did the Mayor of Darkon send you? You must be the one he was talking about that's crazy enough to challenge Clockworks. Here, you'll need this book.

English: It contains information about how Clockworks appeared here in Madrigal. It's a good read, but not for the faint of heart.
Dutch: It contains information about how Clockworks appeared here in Madrigal. It's a good read, but not for the faint of heart.

English: Clockworks is one of the most dangerous monsters in Madrigal! He's huge! I have been studying him for 4 years now, but I still don't know everything about him.
Dutch: Clockworks is one of the most dangerous monsters in Madrigal! He's huge! I have been studying him for 4 years now, but I still don't know everything about him.

English: Visit Dr. Est near the Gouthan Mountains in Darkon 1.
Dutch: Visit Dr. Est near the Gouthan Mountains in Darkon 1.

English: Great Clockworks War - 1st
Dutch: Great Clockworks War - 1st

English: Alright, let's get started. Have you heard of the Great Clockworks War? You'll need to study it before you can challenge Clockworks.
Dutch: Alright, let's get started. Have you heard of the Great Clockworks War? You'll need to study it before you can challenge Clockworks.

English: the Great Clockworks War is the first time the people of Darkon were faced with that terrible menace, Clockworks. The people of Darkon were defeated.
Dutch: the Great Clockworks War is the first time the people of Darkon were faced with that terrible menace, Clockworks. The people of Darkon were defeated.

English: They escaped to the Erons Factory. Evidence of this war can be found all over Darkon… Are you ready to continue to the next step?
Dutch: They escaped to the Erons Factory. Evidence of this war can be found all over Darkon… Are you ready to continue to the next step?

English: Find 5 pieces of War Remnants in Darkon 2, and then visit my brother, Dr. Estern. He is at the Hill of Shade in Saint Morning.
Dutch: Find 5 pieces of War Remnants in Darkon 2, and then visit my brother, Dr. Estern. He is at the Hill of Shade in Saint Morning.

English: I guess you truly aren't ready to face Clockworks. Why did you waste my time?
Dutch: I guess you truly aren't ready to face Clockworks. Why did you waste my time?

English: My brother sent you, right? Nice to meet you! My name is Dr. Estern, Dr. Est's younger brother. Why did he send... Oh, you're going to challenge Clockworks? Okay, do you have the War Remnants?
Dutch: My brother sent you, right? Nice to meet you! My name is Dr. Estern, Dr. Est's younger brother. Why did he send... Oh, you're going to challenge Clockworks? Okay, do you have the War Remnants?

English: Hmm... Five, exactly! Okay, here you are. This book is about the study of Clockworks. It will be really useful in learning about your opponent.
Dutch: Hmm... Five, exactly! Okay, here you are. This book is about the study of Clockworks. It will be really useful in learning about your opponent.

English: Yes? I'm sorry, I think I'm waiting for someone else.
Dutch: Yes? I'm sorry, I think I'm waiting for someone else.

English: Locate 5 pieces War Remnants in Darkon 2 and visit Dr. Estern at the Hill of Shade near Saint Morning
Dutch: Locate 5 pieces War Remnants in Darkon 2 and visit Dr. Estern at the Hill of Shade near Saint Morning

English: Great Clockworks War - 2nd
Dutch: Great Clockworks War - 2nd

English: Now for the final step! You've already heard about the Great Clockworks War. Actually, there was another Clockworks War after that…
Dutch: Now for the final step! You've already heard about the Great Clockworks War. Actually, there was another Clockworks War after that…

English: That time, Clockworks was defeated and captured.
Dutch: That time, Clockworks was defeated and captured.

English: He was held at the cage where he was defeated by the allied forces of Flarine, Saint City and Darkon.
Dutch: He was held at the cage where he was defeated by the allied forces of Flarine, Saint City and Darkon.

English: You can see the evidence of the war in Darkon 1 and at the Plain of Bubble in Flaris.
Dutch: You can see the evidence of the war in Darkon 1 and at the Plain of Bubble in Flaris.

English: Please find 5 War Scars in Darkon 1 and the Plain of Bubble, and then visit my brother, Dr. Estly, who is in Northern Flaris.
Dutch: Please find 5 War Scars in Darkon 1 and the Plain of Bubble, and then visit my brother, Dr. Estly, who is in Northern Flaris.

English: Fine, have it your way. I guess you just aren't ready to face Clockworks.
Dutch: Fine, have it your way. I guess you just aren't ready to face Clockworks.

English: Oh, did my brothers send you to me? Then you must be the Clockworks challenger! Please, show me the War Scars.
Dutch: Oh, did my brothers send you to me? Then you must be the Clockworks challenger! Please, show me the War Scars.

English: Hmmm… everything looks to be in order here! Here, take this book. It is a more detailed study of Clockworks. It goes into detail about his behavior.
Dutch: Hmmm… everything looks to be in order here! Here, take this book. It is a more detailed study of Clockworks. It goes into detail about his behavior.

English: I'm waiting for someone who is supposed to be bringing me something important.
Dutch: I'm waiting for someone who is supposed to be bringing me something important.

English: Find 5 War Scars in Darkon 1 and the Plain of Bubble and visit Dr.Estly in Northern Flaris.
Dutch: Find 5 War Scars in Darkon 1 and the Plain of Bubble and visit Dr.Estly in Northern Flaris.

English: Show What You Can Do
Dutch: Show What You Can Do

English: Well, it looks like you have all the information you need about Clockworks.
Dutch: Well, it looks like you have all the information you need about Clockworks.

English: So, after all that, the masterpiece of Darkon was created, Clocks! What? You don't know what Clocks is?
Dutch: So, after all that, the masterpiece of Darkon was created, Clocks! What? You don't know what Clocks is?

English: It's like a small version of Clockworks. We made it for the people who want to challenge Clockworks, so they can practice first!
Dutch: It's like a small version of Clockworks. We made it for the people who want to challenge Clockworks, so they can practice first!

English: Since you're on your way to becoming the next challenger, why don't you practice a bit, first?
Dutch: Since you're on your way to becoming the next challenger, why don't you practice a bit, first?

English: Clocks' Cage is outside of Darken. You'll have to defeat it, but you'll probably need some help.
Dutch: Clocks' Cage is outside of Darken. You'll have to defeat it, but you'll probably need some help.

English: I knew you were a coward! Hahaha!
Dutch: I knew you were a coward! Hahaha!

English: Congratulations! Now, you are ready to challenge Clockworks. You better be prepared or you'll get squished!
Dutch: Congratulations! Now, you are ready to challenge Clockworks. You better be prepared or you'll get squished!

English: Don't be fooled by his size, Clocks is almost as powerful as Clockworks.
Dutch: Don't be fooled by his size, Clocks is almost as powerful as Clockworks.

English: Defeat Clocks, who is caged just outside of Darken. You may need some help.
Dutch: Defeat Clocks, who is caged just outside of Darken. You may need some help.

English: Create Guild
Dutch: Guild Aanmaken

English: Do you want to create a new guild? Excellent! First, I have to check if you are qualified to create a new guild.
Dutch: Do you want to create a new guild? Excellent! First, I have to check if you are qualified to create a new guild.

English: Okay, first you have to organize your own party. You should be the party leader and the total number of members should be 3, including you. Got it?
Dutch: Okay, first you have to organize your own party. You should be the party leader and the total number of members should be 3, including you. Got it?

English: Once again, make your own party. Remember that you should be the party leader and the total number of members should be 3, including you. Please visit me again once you have done this.
Dutch: Once again, make your own party. Remember that you should be the party leader and the total number of members should be 3, including you. Please visit me again once you have done this.

English: Okay, in that case, if you decide to create a guild later, we'll be here!
Dutch: Okay, in that case, if you decide to create a guild later, we'll be here!

English: Hmm… Okay, lets see. You are the party leader, and there are 3 members... Good!
Dutch: Hmm… Okay, lets see. You are the party leader, and there are 3 members... Good!

English: Now I will let you create your own guild. By the way, according to Madrigal policy, you must pay 3,000,000 Penya to create the guild.
Dutch: Now I will let you create your own guild. By the way, according to Madrigal policy, you must pay 3,000,000 Penya to create the guild.

English: Do you have 3,000,000 Penya right now?
Dutch: Do you have 3,000,000 Penya right now?

English: There seems to be a problem. Maybe you aren't the party leader or you do not have enough members. Remember, you have to be the party leader and you should have 3 party members, including yourself.
Dutch: There seems to be a problem. Maybe you aren't the party leader or you do not have enough members. Remember, you have to be the party leader and you should have 3 party members, including yourself.

English: Please come back again when you have met all of the conditions for creating your guild.
Dutch: Please come back again when you have met all of the conditions for creating your guild.

English: Thanksgiving with Ivil Tobby
Dutch: Thanksgiving with Ivil Tobby

English: My brother Iblis was going to bring us $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$s for Thanksgiving, but he lost them on his way here.
Dutch: My brother Iblis was going to bring us $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$s for Thanksgiving, but he lost them on his way here.

English: I will give you the forbidden gift, a red bead, if you can bring me 1,000 rice cakes. Will you do that?
Dutch: I will give you the forbidden gift, a red bead, if you can bring me 1,000 rice cakes. Will you do that?

English: You can get the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$s by hunting monsters.
Dutch: You can get the $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$s by hunting monsters.

English: Hey, go away if you have nothing to do with me!
Dutch: Hey, go away if you have nothing to do with me!

English: Oh! You did a great job!
Dutch: Oh! You did a great job!

English: You are missing some $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$s....did you eat any of them?
Dutch: You are missing some $QUEST_END_ITEM_NAME$s....did you eat any of them?

English: Ivil Tobby said he will give me the forbidden gift, a red bead, if I can bring him 1,000 rice cakes.
Dutch: Ivil Tobby said he will give me the forbidden gift, a red bead, if I can bring him 1,000 rice cakes.

English: Thanksgiving with Ivil Dorry
Dutch: Thanksgiving with Ivil Dorry

English: I will give you the forbidden gift, an orange bead, if you can bring me 600 rice cakes. Will you do that?
Dutch: I will give you the forbidden gift, an orange bead, if you can bring me 600 rice cakes. Will you do that?

English: Ivil Dorry said she will give me the forbidden gift, an orange bead, if I can bring her 600 rice cakes.
Dutch: Ivil Dorry said she will give me the forbidden gift, an orange bead, if I can bring her 600 rice cakes.

English: Thanksgiving with Ivil Nana
Dutch: Thanksgiving with Ivil Nana

English: I will give you the forbidden gift, a yellow bead, if you can bring me 300 rice cakes. Will you do that?
Dutch: I will give you the forbidden gift, a yellow bead, if you can bring me 300 rice cakes. Will you do that?

English: Ivil Nana said she will give me the forbidden gift, a yellow bead, if I can bring her 300 rice cakes.
Dutch: Ivil Nana said she will give me the forbidden gift, a yellow bead, if I can bring her 300 rice cakes.

English: Thanksgiving with Ivil Tubby
Dutch: Thanksgiving with Ivil Tubby

English: I will give you the forbidden gift, a green bead, if you can bring me 100 rice cakes. Will you do that?
Dutch: I will give you the forbidden gift, a green bead, if you can bring me 100 rice cakes. Will you do that?

English: Ivil Tubby said he will give me the forbidden gift, a green bead, if I can bring him 100 rice cakes.
Dutch: Ivil Tubby said he will give me the forbidden gift, a green bead, if I can bring him 100 rice cakes.

English: Thanksgiving with Ivil Pho
Dutch: Thanksgiving with Ivil Pho

English: I will give you the forbidden gift, a blue bead, if you can bring me 50 rice cakes. Will you do that?
Dutch: I will give you the forbidden gift, a blue bead, if you can bring me 50 rice cakes. Will you do that?

English: Ivil Pho said she will give me the forbidden gift, a blue bead, if I can bring her 50 rice cakes.
Dutch: Ivil Pho said she will give me the forbidden gift, a blue bead, if I can bring her 50 rice cakes.

English: Gather Leaves 01
Dutch: Gather Leaves 01

English: I need leaves... I have to gather more leaves than these guys next to me...
Dutch: I need leaves... I have to gather more leaves than these guys next to me...

English: If you bring me 100 leaves, I will give you the forbidden gift, a Fir Tree. Will you do that?
Dutch: If you bring me 100 leaves, I will give you the forbidden gift, a Fir Tree. Will you do that?

English: You can collect the leaves by hunting any monster in the world.
Dutch: You can collect the leaves by hunting any monster in the world.

English: Get away if you have nothing to do with me! Go!
Dutch: Get away if you have nothing to do with me! Go!

English: Oh, you did it! Congratulations!
Dutch: Oh, you did it! Congratulations!

English: I am still short on leaves! I cannot beat the guys next to me with this handful of leaves!
Dutch: I am still short on leaves! I cannot beat the guys next to me with this handful of leaves!

English: The Firdryad said he will give me the forbidden gift, a Fir Tree, if I bring him 100 leaves.
Dutch: The Firdryad said he will give me the forbidden gift, a Fir Tree, if I bring him 100 leaves.

English: Gather Leaves 02
Dutch: Gather Leaves 02

English: I need leaves... I have to gather more leaves than these guys next to me...
Dutch: I need leaves... I have to gather more leaves than these guys next to me...

English: If you bring me 300 leaves, I will give you the forbidden gift, a Persimmon Tree. Will you do that?
Dutch: If you bring me 300 leaves, I will give you the forbidden gift, a Persimmon Tree. Will you do that?

English: The Persdryad said she will give me the forbidden gift, a Persimmon Tree, if I bring her 300 leaves.
Dutch: The Persdryad said she will give me the forbidden gift, a Persimmon Tree, if I bring her 300 leaves.

English: Gather Leaves 03
Dutch: Gather Leaves 03

English: If you bring me 600 leaves, I will give you the forbidden gift, a Pear Tree. Will you do that?
Dutch: If you bring me 600 leaves, I will give you the forbidden gift, a Pear Tree. Will you do that?

English: The Peardryad said he will give me the forbidden gift, a Pear Tree, if I bring him 600 leaves.
Dutch: The Peardryad said he will give me the forbidden gift, a Pear Tree, if I bring him 600 leaves.

English: Gather Leaves 04
Dutch: Gather Leaves 04

English: If you bring me 1000 leaves, I will give you the forbidden gift, a Pine Tree. Will you do that?
Dutch: If you bring me 1000 leaves, I will give you the forbidden gift, a Pine Tree. Will you do that?

English: The Pinedryad said she will give me the forbidden gift, a Pine Tree, if I bring her 1000 leaves.
